The sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of pegylated interferon alfa-2a and ribavirin in treating HIV-infected patients with compensated liver cirrhosis caused by HCV genotype 1 or 4, with a list of inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of sitagliptin and metformin compared to placebo, with inclusion criteria including BMI 25-35 kg/m2 and HbA1c 6.5%-9% without OHA medication or 6%-8.5% with OHA monotherapy with metformin or sulfonylurea.

The sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for patients with primary progressive multiple sclerosis (PP-MS) using hydroxyurea as the drug, with inclusion criteria based on age, diagnosis, and EDSS score, and exclusion criteria including hypersensitivity to the drug, recent treatment with immunosuppressive drugs or steroids, infections, malignancy, pregnancy or lactation, and low compliance to therapy.

The sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for stroke patients testing the effectiveness of propranolol, with inclusion criteria including symptom onset within 18 hours and imaging evidence of MCA-infarction, and exclusion criteria including patients already receiving beta-blockers and major heart disease.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for diabetes mellitus type 2, testing the efficacy of ly2189265, sitagliptin, placebo solution, placebo tablet, and metformin, with inclusion criteria including a HbA1c value of ≥7.0% to ≤9.5% and a BMI between 25 and 40 kg/m^2.

This is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for patients with moderate to severe ankylosing spondylitis, testing the effectiveness of rituximab, with inclusion and exclusion criteria including age, disease severity, medication history, and lab findings.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of multiple drugs, including aprepitant and dexamethasone, in reducing nausea caused by chemotherapy in cancer patients who are chemotherapy naive and meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Parkinson's disease using istradefylline as a drug, with eligibility criteria including completion of previous studies, absence of certain illnesses and drug allergies, and ability to give informed consent.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of rosiglitazone or placebo in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and ischemic heart disease who have undergone coronary artery bypass grafting, with eligibility criteria including age, disease history, and absence of certain medical conditions.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for breast cancer patients with ER+ and/or PgR+ tumors, testing the efficacy of lapatinib and letrozole compared to placebo, with eligibility criteria including post-menopausal females with stage IV disease and archived tumor tissue available for comparison of tumor response with intra-tumoral expression of ErbB1 and ErbB2.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) with a list of 14 drugs including asparaginase, cyclophosphamide, and methotrexate, and eligibility criteria including no prior disease that would preclude treatment with chemotherapy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic renal anemia, testing the efficacy of methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta and epoetin alfa, with inclusion criteria of continuous iv maintenance epoetin alfa therapy and regular hemodialysis for >= 3 months, and exclusion criteria of transfusion of red blood cells during previous 2 months and poorly controlled hypertension requiring interruption of epoetin alfa treatment in previous 6 months.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for age-related macular degeneration and choroidal neovascularization using ranibizumab as the drug, with eligibility criteria including age, diagnosis of active primary or recurrent CNV secondary to AMD, and BCVA score between 73 and 24 letters.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for epilepsy, testing the drug lamotrigine, with inclusion criteria of a confident diagnosis of epilepsy and currently treated with one or two antiepileptic medications, and exclusion criteria of a history of hypersensitivity to lamotrigine and progressive diseases that would interfere with the study objectives.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for rheumatoid arthritis testing the efficacy of abatacept, non-biologic disease modifying anti-rheumatic drug (dmard), and anti-tumor necrosing factor (tnf) therapy, with inclusion criteria including completed double-blind portion of the IM101064 study, ACR functional class I, II, III, and previous use of anti-TNF therapy for at least 3 months.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pazopanib and sunitinib in treating locally advanced or metastatic renal cell carcinoma, with eligibility criteria including no prior systemic therapy, ECOG PS of 0 or 1, and adequate organ system functions.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the drug cetrorelix pamoate in patients with benign prostatic hypertrophy, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed, and the disease is identified by its name and icd-10 codes.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of repaglinide and short-acting insulin in treating newly diagnosed diabetes mellitus in patients with cystic fibrosis, while excluding those with certain medical conditions and those already treated for diabetes.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of aprepitant, ondansetron, dexamethasone, fosaprepitant dimeglumine, and placebos in treating chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting in patients with malignant disease who are scheduled to receive a single dose of moderately emetogenic chemotherapy, and have a Karnofsky score of 60 or greater, while excluding patients with certain medical conditions, allergies, or abnormal laboratory values.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for locoregionally confined stage III or IV squamous cell carcinoma of the oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, or hypopharynx, using cisplatin and fluorouracil as drugs, with eligibility criteria including ECOG performance status 0-1, WBC > 3,500/mm³, and serum creatinine < 2.0 mg/dL.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tiotropium respimat and placebo respimat in treating asthma in patients aged 18-75 who have been on maintenance treatment with a medium, stable dose of inhaled corticosteroids for at least 4 weeks prior to Visit 1, and meet other inclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ketoprofen in diractin® versus placebo for treating osteoarthritis of the knee in patients who meet specific inclusion criteria and do not have any exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of human insulin inhalation powder and insulin glargine in insulin-naive patients with HbA1c between 8.0% and 10.5%, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for Alzheimer's disease, testing the effectiveness of simvastatin as a treatment, with specific eligibility and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension, testing the efficacy of telmisartan and amlodipine drugs in patients who failed to respond to amlodipine monotherapy, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for prostate cancer with bone metastases, testing the drugs zd4054 and placebo, and the eligibility criteria includes confirmed diagnosis of prostate cancer, increasing PSA, and currently receiving treatment with surgical or medical castration.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for rheumatoid arthritis testing the efficacy of methotrexate, ocrelizumab, and placebo, with inclusion criteria of inadequate response to methotrexate and exclusion criteria of prior biologic therapy or concurrent treatment with any DMARD.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of a combination product (sumatriptan succinate/naproxen sodium) and placebo in treating migraine disorders, with eligibility criteria including 1-8 migraines per month and recent discontinuation of certain triptan medications due to nonresponse or intolerable adverse events.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of azathioprine and infliximab in treating ulcerative colitis in patients who have not responded to corticosteroid treatment, with strict inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for epilepsy patients, testing the effectiveness of lamotrigine and levetiracetam as treatment options, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for rheumatoid arthritis testing the efficacy of tocilizumab sc and iv, along with other drugs, in patients with inadequate response to current DMARD therapy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic pain, testing the efficacy of tramadol hcl er and celecoxib as analgesics, with inclusion criteria including pain intensity score and exclusion criteria including diagnoses of inflammatory arthritis or fibromyalgia.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) testing the efficacy of formoterol fumurate inhalation solution and ipratropium bromide and albuterol sulfate inhalation solution, with inclusion criteria of COPD diagnosis and smoking history, and exclusion criteria of asthma diagnosis and pregnancy/lactation.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with moderate to severe chronic kidney disease, testing the efficacy of ast-120 and placebo, with eligibility criteria including age, serum creatinine levels, urinary protein to creatinine ratio, and blood pressure, and exclusion criteria including previous kidney transplant and significant medical conditions.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of semuloparin sodium versus placebo in preventing venous thromboembolism in cancer patients with metastatic or locally advanced solid tumors of lung, pancreas, stomach, colon/rectum, bladder or ovary initiating a (new) course of chemotherapy with a minimum intent of 3 months therapy, while also excluding patients with high risk of bleeding, severe renal impairment, ECOG performance status 3 & 4, major surgery within 4 weeks before randomization, and known hypersensitivity to unfractionated heparin [UFH] or low molecular weight heparin [LMWH].

This phase 3 clinical trial is testing the efficacy of mesalazine (asacol®) in maintaining remission in patients with ulcerative colitis who have had a symptomatic relapse within the past two years, and meet other eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of various hypertension drugs, including amlodipine and olmesartan medoxomil, on patients with essential hypertension, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for non-small cell lung cancer patients who progressed after platinum-based chemotherapy and will test the drug icotinib, with eligibility criteria including ECOG performance status 0-2 and exclusion criteria including previous treatment with drugs targeting EGFR and history of interstitial lung disease.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for acute ischemic stroke using ancrod and placebo drugs, with inclusion criteria of baseline NIHSS > 5 and exclusion criteria of hypertension, thrombocytopenia, recent use of thrombolytic agent or surgery, and baseline fibrinogen level < 100 mg/dL. The trial involves patients with stroke, cerebral ischemia, and brain infarction, with corresponding ICD-10 codes.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of mp-376 and tis in treating cystic fibrosis patients with positive sputum culture for P. aeruginosa, who are clinically stable and have received at least 3 courses of inhaled tobramycin over the preceding 12 months, while meeting other inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for bladder cancer patients who have undergone radical cystectomy and bilateral pelvic lymphadenectomy, testing the efficacy of cisplatin, doxorubicin hydrochloride, methotrexate, and vinblastine as chemotherapy drugs, with eligibility criteria including p53 gene alteration and no metastatic disease, and patient characteristics such as ECOG 0-1 or Karnofsky 70-100% performance status and creatinine clearance of at least 50 mL/min.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of saxagliptin and metformin against a placebo, with inclusion criteria of inadequate blood sugar control and exclusion criteria of previous treatment for diabetes, current treatment with other medications to lower blood sugar, major heart, liver or kidney problems, and pregnancy or breastfeeding.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder using quetiapine as the drug, with inclusion criteria of patients 66 years or older and exclusion criteria of dementia, substance or alcohol abuse, and cancer or stroke diagnosis.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for congestive heart failure, testing the efficacy of irbesartan and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria based on age, heart function, recent hospitalization, and other health factors.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of nevirapine and atazanavir in HIV-infected patients with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, including no previous antiretroviral treatment and adequate renal function, and aims to assess the susceptibility of the drugs based on HIV-1 genotypic resistance report.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of mometasone furoate nasal spray and placebo nasal spray in treating moderate/severe persistent allergic rhinitis with a history of intermittent asthma, with a list of inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of sitagliptin, pioglitazone, and metformin, with eligibility criteria including completion of a previous study and compliance with contraceptive methods for women of childbearing potential.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for atopic dermatitis, testing the efficacy of pimecrolimus and topical corticosteroids in children aged 3 to <12 months with a diagnosis of AD fulfilling the diagnostic criteria of Seymour, affecting at least 5% total body surface area, and with an IGA score of 2 or 3, with various inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for multiple myeloma and plasma cell neoplasm, testing the efficacy of thalidomide and zoledronic acid as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria for patients.
This is a phase 3 trial for the drug balaglitazone in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic hepatitis B, testing the efficacy of lam group and adv group drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on disease status and previous treatments.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of benign prostatic hyperplasia using tadalafil and placebo, with strict inclusion and exclusion criteria including restrictions on other BPH, ED, and OAB treatments, and a list of medical conditions and medications that would disqualify participants.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for bacterial infections, testing the efficacy of iv vancomycin plus iv aztreonam and ceftaroline, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for subjects.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for neuropathic pain, testing the efficacy of pregabalin (Lyrica) and placebo, with inclusion criteria requiring a diagnosis of peripheral neuropathic pain and a mean weekly pain score of 4 or greater, and exclusion criteria excluding certain diagnoses such as fibromyalgia.
The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for major depressive disorder with psychotic features, testing the efficacy of mifepristone and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This is a phase 3 trial for complicated intra-abdominal infection, testing the efficacy of cxa-201 and metronidazole and meropenem as drugs, with eligibility criteria including surgical intervention within 24 hours and exclusion criteria such as severe renal impairment and allergy to certain antibiotics.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ketamine/amitriptyline np-h cream in treating chemotherapy-related peripheral neuropathy in patients with a history of cancer, with specific eligibility criteria and restrictions on concurrent medications.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of a fixed combination ophthalmic suspension and other drugs in treating open-angle glaucoma and ocular hypertension, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of sitagliptin, canagliflozin, metformin, and sulphonylurea in controlling blood glucose levels, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for precancerous condition using eflornithine and sulindac as drugs, with eligibility criteria including history of surgically resected adenomatous polyp, negative pregnancy test, and no history of allergy to NSAIDs or eflornithine.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for venous thromboembolism, testing the efficacy of semuloparin sodium and enoxaparin compared to placebo in patients who have undergone knee replacement surgery or revision, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder using quetiapine fumarate as the drug, with inclusion criteria including a clinical diagnosis of major depressive disorder and exclusion criteria including a known lack of response to previous treatment with quetiapine.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with cerebral infarction, testing the efficacy of aggrenox capsule in reducing the risk of recurrent stroke, with inclusion criteria including age over 50, stable neurological signs, and at least two risk factors such as hypertension or diabetes.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of azli and placebo in treating cystic fibrosis patients with chronic Burkholderia spp. infection, with eligibility criteria including age, genetic mutations, and chronic infection status, among others.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of primary insomnia using eplivanserin and placebo, with inclusion criteria based on DSM-IV-TR criteria and nocturnal polysomnography recordings, and exclusion criteria including current psychiatric disturbances, use of sleep medication or substances affecting sleep/wake, and certain medical conditions. The trial will test the efficacy of the drugs in patients with sleep initiation and maintenance disorders and insomnia, as indicated by the icd-10 codes.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for postmenopausal women experiencing vasomotor symptoms and hot flashes, testing the efficacy of various drugs including 0.5mg drsp / 0.5mg e2 (bay86-4891) and estradiol, with specific eligibility criteria for inclusion and exclusion.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of methylphenidate HCl, a drug used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, on patients who have completed earlier studies without significant drug-related adverse events and meet certain eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients with positive skin prick tests to relevant aeroallergens, testing the efficacy of montelukast sodium and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial called ACTIVE A, testing the efficacy of clopidogrel and placebo in patients with atrial fibrillation and high risk of vascular events who cannot take oral anticoagulant treatment, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of various drugs including sitagliptin phosphate, metformin hydrochloride, and pioglitazone, with eligibility criteria including age and recent medication history.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for ADHD treatment with atomoxetine hydrochloride, where patients must meet inclusion criteria such as being aged 6 to 18 years old, having ADHD, and not having taken any medication for at least two weeks prior to beginning study treatment, and exclusion criteria such as not having received any treatment within the last 30 days with a drug that has not been approved by their country's appropriate government agency, not having previously experienced any unwanted effects or serious medical events during atomoxetine treatment, and not being judged by the study investigator to be at serious suicidal risk.

This phase 3 trial focuses on de novo renal transplant recipients and tests the efficacy of everolimus, mycophenolate mofetil, basiliximab, cyclosporine a, and corticosteroid in preventing graft rejection.

This phase 3 trial aims to test the effectiveness of ace inhibition, intensified blood pressure control, and add-on angiotensin receptor blockade in children with chronic renal failure, hypertension, and kidney diseases, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for metastatic prostate cancer using chemotherapy (taxotere and prednisone) as the drug, with eligibility criteria including confirmed diagnosis of adenocarcinoma of the prostate, unresponsiveness to hormone therapy, and detectable metastases.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for thromboembolism prevention in patients undergoing hip replacement surgery, using the drug exanta, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for osteoporosis, testing the efficacy of lasofoxifene and raloxifene compared to placebo, with eligibility criteria including postmenopausal women with low bone density and exclusion criteria including recent use of osteoporosis treatments or medication for blood clots or seizures.

This phase 3 trial is testing the use of intravenous magnesium in patients undergoing coronary artery bypass surgery with or without valve procedure, who meet certain inclusion criteria and do not have any of the exclusion criteria, for the treatment of coronary artery disease and valvular heart disease.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of LY2216684, an investigational drug, in treating major depressive disorder in patients who have had a partial response to SSRIs, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for liver cancer patients, testing the efficacy of carboplatin, cisplatin, and doxorubicin hydrochloride, with eligibility criteria including histologically proven hepatoblastoma or hepatocellular carcinoma and standard or high risk disease.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of e2007, a drug for Parkinson's disease, in patients with predictable motor fluctuations and a good response to levodopa, while excluding patients with certain medical conditions and those taking certain medications.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder, testing the efficacy of spd489 (lisdexamfetamine dimesylate) compared to placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria including age, diagnosis, medication history, and medical conditions.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with hyponatremia and congestive heart failure, testing the efficacy of lixivaptan and placebo, with inclusion criteria of patients 18 years or older.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and cardiovascular disease, testing the efficacy of aliskiren and placebo, with eligibility criteria including specific kidney function and history of CV disease, and exclusion criteria including type 1 diabetes mellitus and recent cardiovascular events.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic pancreatitis, testing the efficacy of triamcinolone and bupivicaine alone, with inclusion criteria of chronic pancreatic-type abdominal pain and exclusion criteria of pregnancy, malignancy, recent acute pancreatitis, elevated INR or low platelet count, allergy to eggs or "caine" anesthetics or corticosteroids, and a Beck's depression score >20.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of biphasic insulin aspart 30 and 50, along with metformin, in treating type 2 diabetes with specific eligibility criteria, including HbA1c levels between 7.5% - 12.0% and BMI between 23-40 kg/sq.m, in patients who are currently treated with premix human insulin twice daily with or without oral antidiabetic drugs for at least 3 months.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of dapagliflozin and metformin xr in patients with inadequate glycemic control, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

This is a phase 3 trial for emergency contraception using drugs cdb-2914 and levonorgestrel, with inclusion criteria including women aged 16 or older in the UK, presenting within 120 hours of unprotected intercourse, and with no current use of hormonal contraception.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of lacosamide, an antiepileptic drug, on patients with partial epilepsies and partial onset seizures who meet specific inclusion criteria and do not have any exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of zonisamide, a drug used to treat partial seizures, in children aged 6 to 18 years who have completed a double-blind study, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial focuses on patients with reflux esophagitis and tests the effectiveness of esomeprazole and omeprazole, with eligibility criteria including endoscopic verification of the disease and exclusion criteria including recent use of any PPI or presence of gastric or duodenal ulcer.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for liver transplantation patients using tacrolimus as the drug, with eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria listed, and the icd-10 codes for the disease are also provided.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with essential hypertension, testing the effectiveness of losartan potassium (+) hydrochlorothiazide, with inclusion criteria of patients previously treated with antihypertensive medications for at least 4 weeks but did not reach the blood pressure goal.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of perindopril-indapamide and gliclazide mr-based glucose lowering drugs, with eligibility criteria including age, history of cardiovascular disease, and risk factors for vascular disease.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of dalfampridine-er in patients with multiple sclerosis who meet specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for overactive bladder, testing the efficacy of alkalinized xylocaine and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with moderate to moderately severe chronic active ulcerative colitis who are not responding to currently available therapies, and will test the efficacy of cobitolimod compared to placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of aripiprazole and placebo in treating serious behavioral problems in children with autistic disorder, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for low back pain, testing the efficacy of active theramine and active naproxen and naproxen and theramine-like placebo, with inclusion criteria including back pain lasting greater than six weeks and analgesic medication used to treat pain at least 4 out of last 7 days and at least 10 days in the last month.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for diabetes with saxagliptin, metformin, placebo, and pioglitazone as drugs, and the eligibility criteria include having type 2 diabetes and inadequate blood sugar control, while excluding major heart, liver, or kidney problems and pregnancy or breastfeeding.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ranibizumab in treating central retinal vein occlusion and macular edema, with strict inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of liraglutide and placebo in treating type 2 diabetes and obesity, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and using a list of icd-10 codes to identify eligible patients.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of octreotide acetate and tamoxifen citrate in postmenopausal women with potentially curable breast cancer, who have undergone prior treatment, and have specific disease and patient characteristics, as well as prior and concurrent therapy requirements.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of fentanyl versus placebo in treating chronic pain, osteoarthritis, and low back pain, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for metastatic breast cancer patients with HER-2 overexpression, testing the efficacy of gemcitabine, herceptin, and capecitabine (xeloda) as well as eligibility criteria including prior chemotherapy, measurable disease, and adequate liver and cardiac function.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of alendronate and denosumab in treating osteoporosis and osteopenia in postmenopausal women with specific eligibility criteria, including BMD values and exclusion criteria such as certain disorders and medications.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of sitagliptin and metformin combination therapy versus placebo, with inclusion criteria of poorly controlled patients on one or two oral antidiabetic medications and exclusion criteria of patients with a history of type 1 diabetes mellitus or ketoacidosis, recent insulin therapy, or recent use of certain medications.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tacrolimus, everolimus, and corticosteroids in liver transplant recipients with confirmed hepatitis C virus status and functioning allografts, while excluding patients with certain medical conditions and those who have received multiple solid organ or islet cell tissue transplants.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for cervical dystonia, testing the efficacy of placebo as a treatment option, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patients who have previously been treated with botulinum toxin type A or B.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tiotropium + olodaterol in Japanese patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease who meet specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of glimepiride and linagliptin against placebos, with inclusion and exclusion criteria including HbA1c levels, age, BMI, and prior treatments.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for deep venous thrombosis, testing the efficacy of idrabiotaparinux sodium, idraparinux sodium, avidin, and placebo, with inclusion criteria of confirmed acute symptomatic DVT of the lower limbs and exclusion criteria of severe concomitant diseases, active bleeding or high risk for bleeding, pregnancy or childbearing potential without proper contraceptive measures, breastfeeding, known allergy to idraparinux, SSR126517E, or egg proteins, indication of prolonged anticoagulation for other reason than DVT of the lower limbs, symptomatic pulmonary embolism (PE), and life expectancy < 6 months.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ipragliflozin, a drug used to treat type 2 diabetes mellitus, on patients who meet specific inclusion criteria, such as having a HbA1c value between 6.5% and 9.5%, and exclusion criteria, such as having type 1 diabetes mellitus or a history of treatment with ASP1941.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for metastatic colorectal cancer using a combination of capecitabine, bevacizumab, and irinotecan, with eligibility criteria including confirmed adenocarcinoma, stage IV disease, and adequate hematologic function.

This is a phase 3 trial for patients with unresectable and/or metastatic renal cell carcinoma, testing the efficacy of sorafenib (Nexavar) as a systemic therapy, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria for patient selection.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for lung cancer patients with unresectable stage IIIA or IIIB non-small cell carcinoma, using carboplatin and paclitaxel as drugs, and with eligibility criteria including age, performance status, and absence of prior malignancy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for kidney transplantation and chronic kidney failure, testing the effectiveness of cyclosporine, belatacept li, and belatacept mi, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for subjects.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of dacarbazine, fotemustine, and interferon alfa-2b in treating advanced or recurrent malignant melanoma patients who meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for non-small cell lung cancer with squamous cell, large cell, or adenosquamous carcinoma, testing the drugs cp 751,871 (figitumumab) and erlotinib, with eligibility criteria including prior therapy exclusions and at least one measurable lesion.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Crohn's disease, testing the efficacy of infliximab and azathioprine in patients with moderate to severe disease activity and specific inclusion criteria, while excluding patients with recent abdominal surgery, ostomy, pregnancy, and other serious illnesses.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the efficacy of fluticasone propionate, fluticasone furoate, and placebo, with inclusion criteria such as pre-bronchodilator FEV1 of 40-90% predicted and exclusion criteria such as history of life threatening asthma and allergies to study drugs.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for Friedreich's ataxia patients using idebenone as a drug, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This is a phase 3 trial for antiretroviral-experienced adults with HIV-1, testing the efficacy of lopinavir/ritonavir tablets with nucleoside/nucleotide reverse transcriptase inhibitors, and the eligibility criteria includes plasma HIV-1 RNA levels and laboratory analyses for hemoglobin, neutrophil count, platelet count, and ALT/AST levels.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for rheumatoid arthritis testing the efficacy of mra(tocilizumab) and mtx compared to placebos, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patients, including disease duration and previous treatments.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ff/gw642444 inhalation powder, ff inhalation powder, gw642444 inhalation powder, and placebo in treating chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in patients who meet specific inclusion criteria and do not meet any of the exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for lymphoblastic lymphoma, testing a combination of 12 drugs including asparaginase, cyclophosphamide, and methotrexate, with eligibility criteria including confirmed LBL diagnosis, negative pregnancy test, and no prior chemotherapy or radiotherapy.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of menatetranone and alfacalcidol in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for smoking cessation, testing the effectiveness of nicotine patch, placebo, and varenicline on smokers with tobacco dependence and using icd-10 codes F17.220, F17.221, F17.223, F17.290, F17.291, F17.293, Z81.2, Y36.881S, Y36.891S, Y36.880S, Y36.881A, Y36.881D, Y36.890S, Y36.891A, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of dolutegravir, atripla, abacavir/lamivudine, and their placebos in treating human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection, with eligibility criteria including antiretroviral-naïve patients with a screening plasma HIV-1 RNA ≥1000 c/mL, negative HLAB*5701 allele assessment, and absence of certain exclusion criteria such as malignancy within the past 5 years and recent history of upper or lower gastrointestinal bleed.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) using pantoprazole as the drug, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of exenatide and placebo in treating type 2 diabetes mellitus patients with suboptimal glycemic control, with inclusion and exclusion criteria including stable doses of certain medications and exclusion of previous participation in similar studies.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tocilizumab and placebo in treating moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patients.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of er niacin/laropiprant and placebo, with inclusion criteria of stable antidiabetic medication for at least 3 months and exclusion criteria of certain medications and medical conditions.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of aclidinium bromide/formoterol fumarate and aclidinium bromide alone, compared to placebo, in patients with stable moderate to severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) who are at least 40 years old, current or former smokers with a smoking history of at least 10 pack-years, and have a postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC ratio < 70%, with a list of exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for liver transplantation patients receiving tacrolimus, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed, and the icd-10 codes for the diseases involved include Z52.6, K71.8, K71.7, A06.4, C22.0, C22.3, and K70.0.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of daptomycin and vancomycin or semi-synthetic penicillins (ssps) in treating Gram-positive complicated Skin and Soft Tissue Infections (cSSTIs) in patients 65 years or older with infections of sufficient severity to require in-patient hospitalization, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for metastatic breast cancer, testing the efficacy of pegylated liposomal doxorubicin and capecitabine, with inclusion criteria including clinically or pathologically proven metastatic breast cancer and adequate bone marrow, renal and liver functions, and exclusion criteria including prior chemotherapy for metastatic disease and history of cardiac disease with New York Heart Association Class II or greater.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for seasonal allergic rhinitis and SAR, testing the efficacy of bdp hfa and placebo nasal aerosol, with inclusion criteria including a documented history of SAR and sensitivity to seasonal allergens, and exclusion criteria including recent respiratory infections or disorders and active asthma requiring treatment with corticosteroids.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients undergoing high-risk non-cardiovascular surgeries, testing the use of esmolol as a beta-blocker, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on medical history and other factors.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of rivaroxaban and enoxaparin followed by VKA in treating confirmed acute symptomatic proximal DVT without symptomatic PE in patients who meet the inclusion criteria and do not meet any of the exclusion criteria. The trial is focused on patients with venous thrombosis and the icd-10 codes associated with it.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for schizophrenia with blonanserin and risperidone as drugs, and the eligibility criteria includes meeting DSM-IV-TR criteria for schizophrenia, PANSS total score ≥70 and ≤120, and willingness to comply with study protocol.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for partial seizures and epilepsies, partial, with patients taking stable dosages of 1 to 3 anti-epilepsy medicines, testing the effectiveness of pregabalin and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for ADHD patients aged 8-10 years old, testing the effectiveness of atomoxetine, with inclusion criteria of being medication naive and exclusion criteria of having certain disorders, such as bipolar disorder or autism.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for breast cancer patients, testing the efficacy of capecitabine and taxotere drugs, with eligibility criteria including female patients aged 18-70 with adenocarcinoma of the breast and no evidence of metastatic disease.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pegylated interferon alpha 2b in treating chronic hepatitis B in patients who meet specific eligibility criteria and do not have any exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for multiple sclerosis with two drugs, interferon beta-1b (betaseron, bay86-5046), and eligibility criteria for patients who have completed the BENEFIT study.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of sitagliptin phosphate and placebo as monotherapy, with inclusion criteria of glimepiride and exclusion criteria of type 1 diabetes mellitus.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for leukemia and lymphoma patients, testing a combination of drugs including asparaginase, cyclophosphamide, and vincristine sulfate, with eligibility criteria based on disease characteristics and risk factors.

The trial is a phase 3 study testing the efficacy of four different drugs, including triamcinolone acetonide and ranibizumab, in treating diabetic retinopathy and diabetic macular edema, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for study eye eligibility.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for metastatic prostate cancer patients receiving androgen deprivation therapy, testing the efficacy of risedronate and placebo, with specific eligibility and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with stage 3-5 chronic kidney disease and anemia, testing the efficacy of darbepoetin alfa versus placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for gout patients with hyperuricemia, testing the efficacy of febuxostat and allopurinol, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This phase 3 trial will test the effectiveness of dutasteride and placebo in treating prostatic hyperplasia in male patients aged 50 or older with an estimated prostate volume of at least 30cc, an I-PSS Symptom Score of at least 8 points, and a maximum flow rate of no more than 15mL/sec, among other eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Crohn's disease testing the efficacy of GSK1605786A and placebo, with inclusion criteria including achieving clinical response or remission in a previous GSK study, stable doses of Crohn's disease medications, and willingness to undergo corticosteroid dose tapering, and exclusion criteria including pregnancy, small bowel strictures, and hepatic dysfunction.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of enoxaparin and apixaban in preventing deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism in patients undergoing knee replacement surgery, with eligibility criteria including age 18 or older and exclusion criteria including bleeding disorders and need for ongoing anticoagulation.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for kidney transplant patients, testing the efficacy of enteric-coated mycophenolate sodium, tacrolimus, and corticosteroids, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, for patients with certain kidney diseases.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of carboplatin, cyclophosphamide, mitoxantrone hydrochloride, and paclitaxel in treating stage III or IV ovarian epithelial carcinoma, with eligibility criteria including prior chemotherapy response and specific patient characteristics.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with ovarian, fallopian tube, or primary peritoneal cancer who have had only one prior chemotherapy regimen and have a biochemical recurrence, and will test the effectiveness of tamoxifen citrate and thalidomide as treatment options.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder, testing the efficacy of levomilnacipran er and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified, and the icd-10 codes for the disease listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for male osteoporosis, testing the efficacy of zoledronic acid 5 mg iv versus placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria based on bone density, previous treatments, and medical history.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for dry eye, testing the efficacy of dexamethasone phosphate ophthalmic solution and sodium citrate buffer solution, with inclusion criteria of reported history of dry eye and response to Controlled Adverse Environment model, and exclusion criteria of contraindications to test articles, ocular infections or inflammation, and current contact lens wearers.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for previously untreated metastatic colon or rectal cancer using bevacizumab and fluoropyrimidine-based chemotherapy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for individuals with Down syndrome and Alzheimer's disease, testing the effectiveness of vitamin E, multivitamin, and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting (CINV) with a list of drugs including fosaprepitant dimeglumine, aprepitant, dexamethasone, and ondansetron, and eligibility criteria including age, predicted life expectancy, and contraception use.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) testing the efficacy of aclidinium bromide and placebo, with inclusion criteria based on GOLD guidelines and exclusion criteria including respiratory tract infection, asthma, and cardiovascular conditions.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Caucasian infants born small for gestational age, testing the efficacy of genotropin and control (no treatment) in promoting growth, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of cxa-201 and levofloxacin in treating complicated urinary tract infections and pyelonephritis, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of insulin degludec and sitagliptin in combination with metformin, sulfonylurea or pioglitazone, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with schizophrenia and psychotic disorders, using risperidone as the drug, with inclusion criteria including a diagnosis of schizophrenia and expected benefit from risperidone treatment, and exclusion criteria including substance dependence and hypersensitivity to risperidone.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypercholesterolemia and hyperlipidemia, testing the efficacy of torcetrapib/atorvastatin and atorvastatin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for subjects.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Parkinson's disease and dyskinesias, testing the efficacy of ropinirole controlled-release (Requip CR) for restless leg syndrome, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria related to levodopa therapy and cognitive function.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of lidocaine in treating neuropathic pain in patients who have undergone cancer surgery, with specific eligibility criteria and restrictions on concurrent therapies.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for the drug paliperidone er in patients with schizophrenia, with inclusion criteria including a PANSS score between 70 and 120 and willingness to be hospitalized for at least 14 days, and exclusion criteria including a history of lack of response to any antipsychotic and significant risk of suicidal or violent behavior.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients with positive skin prick test response to house dust mites, testing the efficacy of three drugs: alk hdm ait placebo, alk hdm ait 6 du, and alk hdm ait 12 du, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing consolidation chemotherapy with docetaxel plus cisplatin and ccrt arm without consolidation chemotherapy for patients with non-small cell lung cancer who meet specific eligibility criteria.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of granulocyte colony-stimulating factor plus plerixafor and placebo in patients with multiple myeloma who meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients undergoing knee replacement surgery, testing the efficacy of enoxaparin and apixaban in preventing deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism, with eligibility criteria including no bleeding disorders or recent major surgery.

This is a phase 3 trial for epilepsy patients, testing the efficacy of brivaracetam, with inclusion criteria including well-characterized focal epilepsy or epileptic syndrome and at least 2 but not exceeding 40 partial onset seizures per 4 weeks, while exclusion criteria include seizure type IA non-motor as only seizure type and other serious uncontrolled disease.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with unresectable non-small cell lung cancer, testing the efficacy of carboplatin and cisplatin, with eligibility criteria including specific disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy restrictions.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for head and neck cancer using placebo, palifermin, and cisplatin chemotherapy, with eligibility criteria including histologically documented squamous cell carcinoma and locally advanced stage head and neck cancer, and exclusion criteria including presence or history of any other primary malignancy.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of paclitaxel in treating advanced ovarian, fallopian tube, or primary peritoneal cancer in patients who have achieved complete remission following platinum-based chemotherapy, and have met specific eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of insulin degludec/insulin aspart and biphasic insulin aspart 30 in treating type 2 diabetes mellitus with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, including HbA1c levels and cardiovascular disease history.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug letrozole on postmenopausal women with estrogen and/or progesterone-receptor positive breast cancer, who are not eligible for breast-conserving surgery, and have measurable tumours, while excluding patients with multifocal disease, inflammatory breast cancer, or distant metastasis, and prohibiting simultaneous anti-cancer treatments, hormone replacement therapy, and radiation therapy.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of lenalidomide, melphalan, and prednisone in treating newly diagnosed multiple myeloma patients who meet specific inclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for ulcerative colitis, testing the drugs spd476 and asacol, with inclusion criteria including confirmed remission for at least 30 days and exclusion criteria including proctitis, previous resective colonic surgery, Crohn's disease, hypersensitivity to salicylates, and moderate/severe renal impairment.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of alogliptin and insulin, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

This phase 3 trial focuses on renal transplantation and tests the efficacy of everolimus + cyclosporine, everolimus + enteric-coated mycophenolate sodium (ec-mps), and steroids as drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for female patients with locally recurrent or metastatic breast cancer, testing the efficacy of vinflunine plus capecitabine and capecitabine, with eligibility criteria including prior treatments with anthracycline and taxane, and exclusion criteria including history of severe hypersensitivity to vinca alkaloids and/or fluoropyrimidine.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with graft versus host disease, leukemia, or lymphoma, testing the efficacy of anti-thymocyte globulin, cyclophosphamide, cyclosporine, methotrexate, and methylprednisolone, with specific eligibility criteria for patients based on disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pd 0332334 and placebo in treating generalized anxiety disorder, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on DSM-IV diagnoses and symptom scores.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for vortioxetine and placebo in patients with major depressive disorder, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of topiramate and placebo in treating Tourette Syndrome, with strict inclusion and exclusion criteria, and a focus on patient health and safety.
This is a phase 3 trial for venous thromboembolism using rivaroxaban and enoxaparin as drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patients undergoing elective THR.

This phase 3 trial is testing elacytarabine and investigator's choice drugs for patients with acute myeloid leukemia who have received previous induction/re-induction regimens and have certain eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of methylphenidate hydrochloride in improving quality of life and reducing symptoms such as depression and fatigue in patients with various brain tumors who are undergoing external beam cranial radiotherapy, and meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for glaucoma and ocular hypertension, testing the efficacy of brimonidine 0.2%/timolol 0.5% fixed combination ophthalmic solution and concurrent brimonidine 0.2% and 0.5% timolol, with inclusion criteria of requiring IOP-lowering therapy in both eyes and exclusion criteria of uncontrolled medical conditions or contraindication to β-adrenoceptor antagonist therapy or brimonidine therapy.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of zegerid and losec in treating gastroesophageal reflux disease in patients who have responded to standard PPI therapy in the past 12 months, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of paliperidone extended-release in treating bipolar disorder and mood disorders, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with acute coronary syndrome and coronary artery disease, testing the effectiveness of atorvastatin in reducing the need for direct revascularization techniques, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with metastatic germ cell tumors who have previously been treated with etoposide and cisplatin, and the study will test the efficacy of cisplatin, ifosfamide, paclitaxel, and vinblastine in treating the disease.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma treatment in children aged 6-14, using montelukast sodium and placebo as drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on respiratory conditions, and the icd-10 codes for asthma are provided.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for eltrombopag and placebo in patients with chronic liver disease who require a platelet transfusion to manage the risk of bleeding associated with an elective invasive procedure, and have a baseline platelet count <50,000/µL, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

This phase 3 trial will test the efficacy of vildagliptin, a drug used to treat type 2 diabetes, in combination with metformin in patients with stable HbA1c levels between 6.5-8.0%.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of mycophenolate mofetil, cyclophosphamide, azathioprine, and corticosteroid, as well as placebos, in treating lupus nephritis in patients with systemic lupus erythematosus, who have had a kidney biopsy within 6 months and laboratory evidence of active nephritis.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with genotype 1 hepatitis C infection who have previously received peginterferon-based therapy and relapsed within 1 year, testing the efficacy of tmc435, placebo, peginterferon alpha-2a, and ribavirin, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of a combination of six drugs, including carmustine and doxorubicin hydrochloride, in treating stage III or IV Hodgkin's disease in patients aged 15 to 65 who meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of dapagliflozin, glimepiride, metformin hydrochloride, pioglitazone hydrochloride, and rosiglitazone, with eligibility criteria including inadequate glycaemic control and treatment with a stable sulphonylurea monotherapy dose, and exclusion criteria including type 1 diabetes, hepatic impairment, and renal failure or dysfunction.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of omalizumab, placebo, corticosteroids, and long-acting beta-agonists in treating inadequately controlled asthma in patients with a history of moderate to severe asthma, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with ocular hypertension or open-angle glaucoma using latanoprost 0.005% as prior medication, testing the efficacy of tafluprost, with inclusion criteria requiring ocular surface related symptoms and/or signs.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for lamictal extended-release in patients with epilepsy, including those with partial seizures, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and lists the diseases and icd-10 codes as well as the drug being tested.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for metastatic colorectal cancer testing the efficacy of folfiri regimen, capecitabine, celecoxib, fluorouracil, irinotecan hydrochloride, and leucovorin calcium, with eligibility criteria including confirmed adenocarcinoma, measurable disease, and specific hematopoietic, hepatic, renal, and cardiovascular requirements.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial testing the efficacy of budesonide and placebo in treating active, mild to moderate ulcerative proctitis and proctosigmoiditis, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the efficacy of budesonide/formoterol, budesonide, and theophylline, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes with two drugs, insulin aspart and glibenclamide, and eligibility criteria including HbA1c between 7.5% and 10.0% and BMI below 30.0 kg/m2.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for advanced pancreatic cancer patients who have been previously treated with gemcitabine, testing the efficacy of larotaxel, 5-fluorouracil, and capecitabine, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This is a phase 3 trial for patients with essential hypertension, testing the efficacy of telmisartan/amlodipine fixed combination drugs, with eligibility criteria including failure to respond to Amlodipine 5 mg and exclusion criteria including mean seated Systolic Blood Pressure => 180 mmHg and/or mean seated Diastolic Blood Pressure => 120 mmHg at any visit.

This phase 3 clinical trial is testing the efficacy of ipilimumab and placebo in treating high risk stage III melanoma patients who have undergone complete and adequate resection, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for dry eye syndrome, testing the efficacy of various carboxymethylcellulose-based eye drops, with inclusion criteria of current use of eye drops for dry eye and exclusion criteria of recent eye surgeries or active ocular allergy.

This is a phase 3 trial for non-small-cell lung carcinoma patients, testing the efficacy of sorafenib, placebo, gemcitabine, and cisplatin, with specific eligibility criteria including age, disease stage, and laboratory requirements.

This phase 3 clinical trial is testing the efficacy of docetaxel, leuprolide, and bicalutamide in treating prostate adenocarcinoma with specific eligibility criteria, including PSA doubling time and organ function requirements.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of sertraline and placebo pill in treating depression in patients with a history of coronary heart disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and the presence of depression and heart diseases as the main diseases of interest.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of quetiapine xr versus placebo for treating bipolar disorder, anxiety, anxiety disorders, and substance use disorders, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and the study will not include patients with certain medical conditions or those taking certain medications.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with newly diagnosed acute promyelocytic leukemia, testing the efficacy of a combination of drugs including arsenic trioxide, idarubicin, and methotrexate, with eligibility criteria including confirmation of diagnosis at genetic level and exclusion criteria such as other active malignancy and uncontrolled infections.

This phase 3 trial will test the efficacy of valsartan and placebo in treating atrial fibrillation in patients with underlying cardiovascular diseases/comorbidities, with inclusion criteria including documented history of stroke or peripheral vascular disease, and exclusion criteria including recent acute myocardial infarction or bypass surgery, and serum creatinine level above 2.5 mg/dL.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for bipolar disorder, affective disorders, and mood disorders, testing the efficacy of topiramate versus placebo, with inclusion criteria including a DSM-IV diagnosis of Bipolar I Disorder and a YMRS score greater than or equal to 20, and exclusion criteria including a diagnosis of autistic disorder, schizophrenia, or other psychotic disorders not otherwise specified, and chronic antidepressant treatment within 4 weeks of randomization.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug gw873140 on HIV-infected patients with specific eligibility criteria, including prior antiretroviral experience and resistance, and exclusion criteria such as acute laboratory abnormalities and recent participation in an experimental drug trial.

This phase 3 trial focuses on kidney transplant recipients and compares the effectiveness of two drug combinations, everolimus and tacrolimus, and mycophenolate mofetil and tacrolimus, in preventing organ rejection, with specific eligibility and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension and metabolic syndrome, testing the efficacy of olmesartan medoxomil and placebo, with eligibility criteria including age, blood pressure, and metabolic traits, and exclusion criteria including diabetes and secondary hypertension.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with breast cancer and metastasis expressing HER2-NEU, testing the efficacy of trastuzumab in association with chemotherapy, with eligibility criteria including good general conditions, age between 18 and 70 years, and no cerebral metastasis, while exclusion criteria include prior cerebral radiotherapy and positive serology, among others.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tmc125 and darunavir/ritonavir in HIV patients with drug resistance or antiretroviral failure, and eligibility criteria include a history of drug resistance, HIV-1 positivity, and continuous use of the same PI regimen for 4 months prior to screening.
This phase 3 trial is testing the use of heparin in patients with end stage renal disease who meet specific eligibility criteria and do not have any exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension, testing the efficacy of telmisartan and ramipril, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This phase 3 trial will test the efficacy of everolimus, cyclosporine, and prednison in de novo kidney transplant recipients and renal transplantation patients, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with glioblastoma multiforme, testing the efficacy of il13-pe38qqr and GLIADEL® Wafer drugs, with specific eligibility criteria including previous cytoreductive surgery or biopsy for GBM, and adequate hematologic status.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for ulcerative colitis patients, testing the efficacy of asacol 400 mg, with eligibility criteria including a documented history of UC, a baseline PUCAI score < 10, and a stable maintenance dose of oral mesalamine for at least 1 month prior to entry in the study.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of Xalacom and unfixed latanoprost and timolol in treating open-angle glaucoma and ocular hypertension, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria related to the patient's eye health history.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for the drug fasudil in patients with scleroderma and definite Raynaud's, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for colorectal cancer testing the efficacy of fluorouracil and leucovorin calcium in patients with resectable adenocarcinoma of the rectum, with eligibility criteria including age under 80, WHO 0-1 performance status, and no prior biologic, chemotherapy, endocrine, radiotherapy, or surgery for adenocarcinoma of the rectum.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for female patients with metastatic breast cancer, testing the efficacy of vinflunine and alkylating agent of physician choice registered in cancer, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for hormone refractory prostate cancer using satraplatin and prednisone as drugs, with eligibility criteria including stage D2 metastatic prostate cancer and progression after one prior chemotherapy.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of leucovorin, oxaliplatin, and 5-fluorouracil in treating pancreatic neoplasms, with specific eligibility criteria including previous treatment with gemcitabine-based chemotherapy and adequate liver and kidney function.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of overactive bladder in children, testing the efficacy of solifenacin succinate suspension and placebo, with inclusion criteria including symptoms of urgency and daytime incontinence, and exclusion criteria including urinary tract infections and congenital anomalies affecting lower urinary tract function.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for schizophrenia using quetiapine xr as the drug, with inclusion criteria based on age, diagnosis, and PANSS score, and exclusion criteria including other Axis I disorders, pregnancy/lactation, and intolerance to quetiapine IR.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of mesalazine and placebo in treating left-sided uncomplicated diverticular disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and the disease is identified by a list of icd-10 codes.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for osteoarthritis knee pain, testing the efficacy of duloxetine and placebo, with inclusion criteria being outpatients with the disease and exclusion criteria being serious medical or psychiatric conditions or previous exposure to duloxetine.

This is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of exenatide versus placebo in patients with specific eligibility criteria, including HbA1c levels and BMI, and excluding those who have previously received exenatide or certain other medications.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of dapagliflozin, metformin, and pioglitazone, with eligibility criteria including inadequate glycemic control, C-peptide ≥ 1.0 ng/mL, and BMI ≤ 45.0 kg/m².
