This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of 323u66 SR, a drug containing bupropion, in treating major depressive disorder in outpatients who meet specific eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of inhaled insulin for patients with diabetes mellitus type 2 who have failed two or more oral anti-diabetic agents, and the inclusion and exclusion criteria are specified.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for postmenopausal women with osteoporosis, back pain, and spinal fractures, testing the efficacy of teriparatide, risedronate, and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of letrozole, bevacizumab, and fulvestrant in treating HER2-negative breast cancer patients with positive hormone receptors and who are candidates for first-line treatment with letrozole, while also allowing treatment with bisphosphonates.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for partial seizures, testing the effectiveness of pregabalin and levetiracetam in patients who have been unresponsive to prior antiepileptic drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with proliferative diabetic retinopathy and diabetic macular edema, testing the efficacy of ranibizumab and triamcinolone acetonide, with eligibility criteria including age, diagnosis of diabetes mellitus, and visual acuity score.

This is a phase 3 trial for bipolar disorder using quetiapine as the drug, with eligibility criteria including moderate-to-severe hypomanic symptoms and exclusion criteria including severe depressive symptoms and serious general medical illnesses.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with schizophrenia, testing the effectiveness of olanzapine and olanzapine pamoate depot, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and using ICD-10 codes to identify eligible patients.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for schizophrenia, testing the efficacy of ziprasidone oral capsules and placebo, with inclusion criteria including DSM-IV criteria for schizophrenia, a Brief Psychiatric Rating Scale score ≥35, and age 13-17 years, and exclusion criteria including imminent risk of suicide or homicide and any history of serious or unstable medical illness.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of azilsartan medoxomil, a blood pressure medication, in combination with metformin for type 2 diabetes patients with inadequate glycemic control and hypertension.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of a placebo for sch 39641 in treating ragweed-induced allergic rhinoconjunctivitis, with inclusion criteria including a positive skin prick test response to Ambrosia artemisiifolia and a forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1) of at least 70% of predicted value, and exclusion criteria including unstable asthma, history of anaphylaxis with cardio-respiratory symptoms, and participation in any other clinical trial.
The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for psoriasis vulgaris, testing the efficacy of LEO 90100 and vehicle as treatments, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of a combination of enfuvirtide, raltegravir, darunavir, tipranavir, etravirine, and maraviroc in treating HIV-1 infection in patients with triple-class drug experience or resistance, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for gastric cancer using uft (uracil, tegafur) as the drug, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug alogliptin on patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus who completed one of seven controlled Phase III studies, and the eligibility criteria includes having alanine aminotransferase less than or equal to 3 times the upper limit of normal and serum creatinine less than or equal to 2.0 mg per dL.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of docetaxel + estramustine + hydrocortisone and docetaxel + prednisone in treating advanced prostate carcinoma with eligibility criteria including previous hormone treatment and testosterone levels < 50 ng/dL.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for osteoporosis, testing the effectiveness of phylloquinone and menatetranone, with eligibility criteria including postmenopausal females who are ambulatory, community dwelling, able to ingest calcium and vitamin D supplements, and willing to restrict vitamin K intake, among other requirements.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with mixed dyslipidemia and qualifying cIMT thickness, testing the drugs abt-335 and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus testing the efficacy of exenatide once weekly and insulin detemir in patients with suboptimal glycaemic control and a BMI of 25-45 kg/m2 who are receiving metformin at a stable dose or metformin and sulphonylurea, with various inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of Stribild, a combination of antiretroviral drugs, in treating patients with acquired immunodeficiency syndrome and HIV infections who meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial testing the efficacy of iv dalbavancin and vancomycin/linezolid in treating abscess, wound infection, surgical site infection, and cellulitis caused by Gram-positive bacteria, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of cilostazol in treating atherosclerosis-related peripheral vascular diseases, with eligibility criteria including symptoms of intermittent claudication and positive noninvasive evaluation for significant aortoiliac PAD, while exclusion criteria include allergy or intolerance to cilostazol and presence of critical limb ischemia or acute limb ischemia.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tapentadol extended release in treating pain, osteoarthritis, and low back pain, with inclusion criteria including completion of previous trials and willingness to take the drug, and exclusion criteria including certain medical conditions and medication use.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of COV155 and placebo in managing postoperative pain in patients undergoing primary unilateral first metatarsal bunionectomy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and a requirement for a postoperative pain intensity score ≥5 on a 0 to 10 Numerical Pain Rating Score (NPRS) for randomization into the Double-Blind Phase.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for neoplasms of the prostate, testing the effectiveness of dutasteride and placebo, with specific eligibility criteria including PSA levels and previous medical history.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the efficacy of montelukast and salmeterol/fluticasone propionate inhalation powder, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and a list of icd-10 codes for asthma.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of irinotecan, leucovorin, 5-fluorouracil, docetaxel, cisplatin and leucovorin, 5-fluorouracil in treating adenocarcinoma of the stomach or gastroesophageal junction, with specific eligibility criteria for patients.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of losartan potassium (+) hydrochlorothiazide in treating patients with metabolic disorder and untreated hypertension, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with neurogenic urinary bladder, testing the efficacy of alfuzosin and placebo drugs, with specific eligibility and exclusion criteria.

This is a phase 3 trial for urinary bladder overactivity, testing the efficacy of mirabegron and tolterodine compared to placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with metastatic colorectal cancer, testing the efficacy of capecitabine, floxuridine, and oxaliplatin, with eligibility criteria including specific disease characteristics and patient characteristics, and excluding prior concurrent therapy.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for major depressive disorder (MDD) patients who have a partial response to SSRI treatment, and will test the efficacy of ly2216684 and placebo in combination with SSRI. The eligibility criteria include a clinical diagnosis of MDD, use of reliable birth control, and meeting pre-defined psychiatric scales. Exclusion criteria include presence of other primary psychiatric illness, diagnosed medical condition that could be exacerbated by noradrenergic agents, and history of treatment-resistant depression.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pregabalin for central neuropathic pain after spinal cord injury, stroke, or multiple sclerosis, with inclusion criteria including pain VAS at least 40mm in Visit 1 and Visit 2, and exclusion criteria including creatinine clearance < 60 mL/min and platelet count < 100 × 103/mm3, among others.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for liver transplant patients, testing the effectiveness of mycophenolate mofetil and tacrolimus as immunosuppressive treatment, with inclusion criteria including primary liver transplantation and exclusion criteria including autoimmune hepatitis and treated hypertension.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension using valsartan plus hydrochlorothiazide as the drug, with inclusion criteria based on blood pressure levels and written informed consent, and exclusion criteria not provided.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for postmenopausal osteoporosis using arzoxifene and placebo, with inclusion criteria of female participants aged 60-85 years and exclusion criteria including history of certain cancers and medication use, and the trial is testing the ability of extended release nifedipine to decrease the dose of glucocorticoid medication in children with congenital adrenal hyperplasia.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of naltrexone sr 32 mg/bupropion sr 360 mg/day versus placebo in treating obesity and overweight patients with specific eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of high and low dose dexamethasone in treating vomiting and headache in children undergoing radiation therapy for brain tumors, with inclusion criteria including age, tumor size, and prior enrollment in the dexamethasone study.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for smoking cessation, testing the efficacy of placebo and varenicline (cp-526,555) in patients with schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder who are motivated to quit smoking and meet certain inclusion and exclusion criteria. The trial includes patients between the ages of 18 and 75 who smoke at least 15 cigarettes per day and have been stable on psychiatric treatment for at least 6 months.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for osteoarthritis of the knee, testing the efficacy of diclofenac topical sodium gel 1%, with eligibility criteria including exclusion of other rheumatic diseases and allergies to analgesic drugs.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of 1mg and 4mg triamcinolone acetonide in treating diabetic macular edema, with eligibility criteria including age, diabetes diagnosis, and willingness to provide informed consent.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of daptomycin and vancomycin in treating MRSA infected foot ulcers in patients with Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes mellitus, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of ciclosporin in treating chronic hepatitis C patients who have undergone liver transplantation and meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with stage I or II non-small cell lung cancer who are current smokers, testing the effectiveness of bupropion hydrochloride and nicotine in helping patients quit smoking within 30 days after registration, while also meeting various eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients undergoing allogenic stem cell or bone marrow transplantation with a history of leukemia or graft-versus-host disease, testing the efficacy of budesonide as a prophylaxis for GVHD, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ACR16 and placebo in treating Huntington's disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patients, and the trial will take place in France.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of sevelamer carbonate and placebo in reducing serum phosphorus levels in patients with chronic kidney disease on hemodialysis, with inclusion criteria including a minimum of 30 days on hemodialysis and a central laboratory serum iPTH measurement less than 1000 pg/mL at Visit 1.

This is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of insulin glulisine and insulin glargine, with eligibility criteria including A1c levels between 7.5% and 10%, negative GAD autoantibodies, and ability to perform self-monitoring of blood glucose.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for previously untreated head and neck squamous cell carcinoma using tirapazamine and cisplatin, with specific eligibility criteria including stage III or IV disease and ECOG performance status less than or equal to 2.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for bipolar disorder, testing the efficacy of Risperdal Consta and placebo, with inclusion criteria including a current diagnosis of bipolar disorder and at least four episodes of mood disorder in the last year that required psychiatric intervention.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder, testing the effectiveness of lurasidone hcl and risperidone, with eligibility criteria including meeting DSM-IV criteria for the primary diagnosis, being 18-75 years old, and not having a chronic organic disease of the central nervous system.
This is a phase 3 clinical trial for the drug memantine hcl in treating major depression, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on DSM-IV diagnosis and medical history.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pegfilgrastim in breast cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy with an increased risk of febrile neutropenia, with eligibility criteria including age, liver function, and prior chemotherapy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension, testing the efficacy of carvedilol controlled release/lisinopril and lisinopril + placebo, with inclusion criteria of age 18-80 and mean sitting systolic blood pressure >/=140mmHg to </=170mmHg, and exclusion criteria of taking two or more antihypertensive medications or having Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the effects of bifidobacterium lactis (bb-12) and placebo on healthy children aged 1-3 attending daycare or preschool centers, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with non-myeloid cancer receiving chemotherapy-related anemia, testing the efficacy of sodium ferric gluconate complex in sucrose, with eligibility criteria including ECOG performance status, ferritin levels, and absence of certain hematologic disorders or gastrointestinal conditions.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic hepatitis C, testing the efficacy of pegylated-interferon alfa-2a and ribavirin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on genotype and liver disease status.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug bc1036 on patients with a persistent cough, with inclusion criteria including confirmed diagnosis of cough and Leicester Cough Questionnaire score of ≤ 17 at baseline, while exclusion criteria include treatment with systemic oral steroids within 7 days prior to randomisation at Visit 2 and any pulmonary co-morbidity such as COPD.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with ocular hypertension or open-angle glaucoma using latanoprost 0.005% as prior medication, testing the efficacy of tafluprost, with inclusion criteria of ocular surface related symptoms and/or signs.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of insulin glulisine and insulin glargine in treating type 2 diabetes mellitus, with inclusion criteria including stable insulin regimen and HbA1c between 7.5% and 11.0%.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of xaliproden and placebo in treating colorectal neoplasms, with eligibility criteria including completion of oxaliplatin-containing chemotherapy and Grade ≥ 1 PSN, and exclusion criteria including pre-existing peripheral neuropathy and receiving any further anti-cancer treatment.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug cf101 for the treatment of moderate-to-severe Aqueous-Deficient Dry Eye, with eligibility criteria including positive corneal fluorescein staining, Schirmer Test score, and OSDI score, and exclusion criteria including use of certain medications and presence of certain ocular diseases.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of canagliflozin and antihyperglycemic agents versus placebo, with inclusion criteria of HbA1c between >=7 and <=10.0%, FPG <270 mg/dL, and exclusion criteria of history of diabetic ketoacidosis, type 1 diabetes mellitus, pancreas or beta cell transplantation, or severe hypoglycemic episode within 6 months before screening.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tivozanib and sorafenib in treating advanced renal cell carcinoma in subjects who have undergone prior nephrectomy and have measurable disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of insulin degludec/insulin aspart and insulin glargine in combination with metformin and other oral antidiabetic drugs for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for ferumoxytol, a drug used to treat iron deficiency anemia, with eligibility criteria including low hemoglobin and transferrin saturation levels, unsatisfactory oral iron therapy, and exclusion criteria including allergy to IV iron and pregnancy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) with a list of drugs including beclomethasone and budesonide, and eligibility criteria including FEV1 levels and smoking history.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of safinamide and placebo in treating idiopathic Parkinson's disease in patients who are levodopa-responsive and have motor fluctuations, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of rosuvastatin calcium and atorvastatin in treating non-ST segment elevation acute coronary syndromes, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder, testing the efficacy of vortioxetine and duloxetine compared to placebo, with inclusion criteria of moderate to severe depression and exclusion criteria of any current psychiatric or substance disorder, and use of any psychoactive medication 2 weeks prior to screening and during the study.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of doxorubicin hydrochloride, etoposide, and ifosfamide in treating high-risk soft tissue sarcoma patients who meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus patients using ipragliflozin and DPP-4 inhibitor drugs, with inclusion criteria including HbA1c value between 6.5 and 9.5% and BMI between 20.0 and 45.0 kg/m2, and exclusion criteria including type 1 diabetes mellitus and significant renal, hepatic or cardiovascular diseases.
This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of lopinavir/ritonavir plus nucleoside(s) in treating HIV infection, with strict inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of various drugs, including fluticasone furoate and salbutamol, on patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) who meet specific inclusion criteria, such as being former or current smokers with a clinical history of COPD and a post-albuterol spirometry criteria of FEV1/FVC ratio ≤ 0.70 and FEV1 ≤ 70% of predicted normal (NHANES III).

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of bicalutamide, buserelin, flutamide, goserelin, leuprolide acetate, and docetaxel in treating localized prostate cancer with high risk of recurrence, and patients must meet certain eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of umeclidinium/vilanterol and fluticasone propionate/salmeterol compared to placebo in treating chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in patients who are current or former smokers with a history of at least 10 pack-years, and have a pre and post-salbutamol FEV1/Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) ratio of <0.70 and a post-salbutamol FEV1 of >=30% and <=70% of predicted normal values calculated using National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey (NHANES) III reference equations.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of ir methylphenidate, modafinil, and sr methylphenidate in treating cognitive decline in patients with brain tumors who have had prior radiation treatment, and have a Karnofsky performance status of 70 or higher, while also excluding patients with certain medical conditions or taking certain medications.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the drug GSK573719 in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), with inclusion criteria including a diagnosis of COPD, a history of cigarette smoking, and a dyspnea score of 2 or greater, and exclusion criteria including use of certain medications and a history of alcohol or drug abuse.

This is a phase 3 trial for prostate cancer with the drugs rofecoxib and placebo, requiring regular PSA testing and study biopsies, and the icd-10 codes for the disease include C61, D29.1, D40.0, Z15.03, Z80.42, Z85.46, and Z12.5.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of liraglutide and oral anti-diabetic drugs in Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes, who meet specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and have not been treated with GLP-1 receptor agonist or DPP-4 inhibitor within 12 weeks prior to Visit 1.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with mild abnormalities of the aortic valve, testing the efficacy of ezetimibe (+) simvastatin and placebo drugs, with inclusion criteria of patients aged 45 to 85 and exclusion criteria of previous trial participation or current use of disallowed medications.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for non-small-cell lung carcinoma, lung cancer, and anemia, testing the effectiveness of epoetin alfa in increasing hemoglobin levels in patients with lung cancer who have not received platinum-based chemotherapy in the past two months or plan to receive it in the next three months.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of vincristine sulfate, carmustine, melphalan, cyclophosphamide, and prednisone in treating multiple myeloma patients who meet specific eligibility criteria, including measurable disease and no prior chemotherapy treatment.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for infertility, testing the drugs dr-2011 and crinone 8%, with inclusion criteria including pre-menopausal age, specific types of infertility, and semen analysis, and exclusion criteria including contraindication to progesterone therapy and history of failed IVF cycles or miscarriages.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Alzheimer's disease and dementia, testing the efficacy of mpc-7869, with inclusion criteria including a diagnosis of probable Alzheimer's disease, age 55 or older, and a reliable caregiver, and exclusion criteria including evidence of other causes of dementia and active malignancy.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of gsk1120212 and chemotherapy in treating BRAF V600E/K mutation-positive cutaneous melanoma, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria listed.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of methylphenidate hydrochloride extended-release tablets in treating attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) in adults, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of telmisartan+amlodipine fixed dose combination in treating hypertension, with inclusion criteria including age over 18 and mean seated diastolic blood pressure equal or more than 100 mmHg, and exclusion criteria including current treatment with any antihypertensive agents that cannot be safely stopped.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for HIV-1 infections, testing the efficacy of tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (tdf), emtricitabine/tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (ftc/tdf), and placebo, with eligibility criteria for both HIV-1 infected and uninfected partners in a discordant heterosexual relationship.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for vildagliptin, a drug used to treat type 2 diabetes, with inclusion criteria including stable metformin dose, specific blood glucose levels, and BMI range, and exclusion criteria including type 1 diabetes, pregnancy or lactation, and significant diabetic complications.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes patients with HbA1C between 7.0% and 11.0%, testing the efficacy of liraglutide and exenatide, with inclusion criteria including stable treatment with oral anti-diabetic drugs and BMI lower than 45.0 kg/m2, and exclusion criteria including previous treatment with insulin and impaired liver or/and renal function.
This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of velcade, thalidomide, and dexamethasone in treating relapsing or progressive multiple myeloma, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of avlocardyl and placebo in treating posttraumatic stress disorder in patients who meet specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, including having a diagnosis of PTSD according to DSM IV-TR criteria and not being treated with certain substances or having certain psychiatric or somatic pathologies.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for preventing graft rejection in heart transplant patients using a combination of everolimus, mycophenolate mofetil, cyclosporine, and corticosteroids, with eligibility criteria including age and functional graft status, and exclusion criteria including previous organ transplants and ABO incompatibility.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of benign prostatic hypertrophy, testing the efficacy of cetrorelix 78+78 and cetrorelix 78 + placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of peginterferon alfa-2a and ribavirin in treating chronic hepatitis C infection, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and requires the use of two forms of effective contraception during and after treatment.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with sickle cell disease and pulmonary hypertension, testing the effectiveness of bosentan, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This is a phase 3 trial for diabetic neuropathies, testing the efficacy of duloxetine hydrochloride and placebo drugs, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This phase 3 trial aims to treat atherosclerosis and acute coronary syndrome with drugs such as cangrelor and clopidogrel, and the eligibility criteria includes angiography demonstrating atherosclerosis amenable to treatment by PCI and diagnosis of ACS by elevated cardiac markers or ischemic chest discomfort.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of loteprednol etabonate and its vehicle in reducing inflammation and pain in patients undergoing cataract surgery, with inclusion criteria of age over 18 and candidacy for routine surgery, and exclusion criteria of hypersensitivity to the study drug, severe ocular or medical conditions, elevated intraocular pressure, and poor visual acuity in the non-study eye.

This is a phase 3 trial for HIV infections testing the efficacy of raltegravir and placebo in patients with sustained HIV RNA < 50 copies/ml, with inclusion and exclusion criteria including CD4 count, pregnancy status, and previous use of integrase inhibitors.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for soft tissue sarcoma, testing the efficacy of doxorubicin in combination with palifosfamide-tris or placebo, with eligibility criteria including age, disease type, prior treatment, performance status, and organ function.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of a combination tablet of treximet (sumatriptan/naproxen sodium) in treating migraine disorders in adolescents aged 12-17 years old with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for breast cancer patients with locally recurrent or metastatic disease, testing the efficacy of docetaxel and bevacizumab, with eligibility criteria including HER2-negative cancer and ECOG performance status of 0-1.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for non-small cell lung cancer, testing the efficacy of docetaxel and carboplatin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for smoking cessation using nicotine as the drug, with inclusion criteria based on BMI and smoking habits, and exclusion criteria based on intolerance to nicotine or suspected smoking during the sequestration period.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for HIV infections in Abidjan, testing the effectiveness of a combination of antiretroviral drugs including zidovudine, lamivudine, efavirenz, ritonavir, and indinavir, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with chronic myelogenous leukemia, testing the efficacy of hydroxyurea and homoharringtonine as treatment options, with eligibility criteria including prior treatment failure with alpha-Interferon and age ≥ 16 years.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for a drug called pf-00345439, which is being tested for its effectiveness in treating moderate to severe pain caused by osteoarthritis or low back pain, and the eligibility criteria includes age, gender, and contraceptive use.

This phase 3 trial is testing chlorambucil and fludarabine for the treatment of Waldenström macroglobulinemia, lymphoplasmacytic lymphoma, and splenic marginal zone lymphoma, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of duloxetine and placebo in treating generalized social anxiety disorder, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and a list of icd-10 codes for the disease.
This is a phase 3 trial for diabetes mellitus testing the efficacy of acarbose and placebo drugs on patients with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for Crohn's disease patients who are steroid-dependent and in clinical remission, testing the efficacy of dexamethasone as a treatment option, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for painful diabetic neuropathy, testing the efficacy of pregabalin (lyrica) versus placebo, with inclusion criteria requiring patients to be receiving treatment for the condition and exclusion criteria excluding patients with other pain conditions.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for ovarian cancer patients receiving platinum-based chemotherapy and interval debulking surgery, with eligibility criteria including residual macroscopic disease and no concurrent or prior malignancy likely to interfere with protocol treatments or comparison, and the drug being tested is chemotherapy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Chinese patients with relapsing remitting or secondary progressive multiple sclerosis, testing the effectiveness of interferon beta-1b (betaseron, bay86-5046), with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of oxaliplatin+capecitabine and oxaliplatin+capecitabine+bevacizumab in treating patients with colorectal cancer and liver metastases who have undergone R0 resection, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of gemcitabine in treating locally advanced or regional pancreatic cancer, with specific eligibility criteria including age, performance status, and adequate bone marrow reserve, liver and renal function.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for ovarian cancer, testing liposomal doxorubicin, carboplatin, and paclitaxel, with inclusion criteria including a diagnosis of stage Ic-IV ovarian cancer and indication for chemotherapy treatment, and exclusion criteria including previous chemotherapy treatment and heart disease.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for diabetes mellitus and hypercholesterolemia, testing the efficacy of atorvastatin and its placebo, with inclusion criteria including stable insulin therapy and fasting LDL-C>100mg/dl, and exclusion criteria including severe dyslipidemia and current use of lipid lowering or antidiabetic drugs.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of resatorvid and placebo in treating sepsis in patients who meet specific eligibility criteria, including having a suspected or proven bacterial or fungal infection and having developed at least 3 of 4 systemic inflammatory response syndrome criteria within 36 hours prior to study drug administration.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for CD20+ low-grade lymphoma using rituximab and interferon-a-2a as drugs, with eligibility criteria including stage II-IV lymphoma and exclusion criteria including prior treatment with rituximab or an interferon.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tiotropium respimat® and salmeterol hfa mdi in treating asthma, with inclusion criteria including confirmed diagnosis of asthma, use of inhaled corticosteroids, and symptomatic at screening, while exclusion criteria include recent use of certain medications and history of significant diseases.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of RAD001 and placebo in treating metastatic renal cell carcinoma patients who have previously received sunitinib and/or sorafenib, with various eligibility criteria including measurable lesions, Karnofsky Performance Status ≥70%, and adequate bone marrow, liver and renal function.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of Sativex and placebo in treating central neuropathic pain in patients with multiple sclerosis who have been on analgesic therapy, with inclusion criteria including at least two years of MS and at least three months of stable CNP.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for depression, testing the efficacy of risperidone and placebo comparator in patients with severe depression and suicidality, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder, testing the efficacy of levomilnacipran er and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for non small cell lung carcinoma, testing the drug iressa (gefitinib) in combination with chemotherapy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for metastatic breast cancer, testing the drugs ct-p6, herceptin, and paclitaxel, with eligibility criteria including Her 2 over-expression and ECOG 0 or 1, and exclusion criteria including current CNS metastases and infection, and no pregnant or nursing mothers allowed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for ovarian cancer patients with specific disease characteristics and patient characteristics, testing the effectiveness of carboplatin and paclitaxel drugs, with eligibility criteria including complete surgical staging and no prior treatment for this malignancy except surgical staging.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of epithelial ovarian cancer, primary peritoneal cancer, and fallopian tube cancer using paclitaxel+carboplatin, with eligibility criteria including confirmed cancer diagnosis, no prior chemotherapy, and specific blood count and liver function requirements.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for insulin-naive patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of insulin degludec/insulin aspart and insulin glargine in combination with oral antidiabetic drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This is a phase 3 trial for HIV infections testing the effectiveness of enfuvirtide and an optimized background antiretroviral regimen (OB) in participants previously treated with drugs of 2 or 3 different antiretroviral classes, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with unresectable metastatic colorectal cancer, testing the efficacy of bevacizumab, capecitabine, and oxaliplatin, with eligibility criteria including age, cancer confirmation, measurable lesion, and ECOG performance status, and exclusion criteria including previous treatment with Avastin, previous systemic treatment for advanced or metastatic disease, clinically significant cardiovascular disease, and daily chronic treatment with high doses of aspirin or non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for ovarian cancer patients with resistance to platinum/taxane-based chemotherapy, testing the efficacy of karenitecin and topotecan, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for postmenopausal women with primary invasive breast carcinoma resected at time of original diagnosis, testing the efficacy of letrozole as adjuvant therapy after completing at least 4.5 years of adjuvant tamoxifen or aromatase inhibitor therapy, with eligibility criteria including specific disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for osteoarthritis, testing the efficacy of diclofenac and placebo in patients with chronic NSAID use and documented osteoarthritis flare, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of high and low dose fdc, bi 10773, and linagliptin in treating type 2 diabetes mellitus, with eligibility criteria including a diagnosis of type 2 diabetes mellitus, HbA1c levels between 7.0% and 10.5%, and absence of any oral antidiabetic therapy, glucagon like peptide-1 analog or insulin for 12 weeks prior to randomization.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for endometriosis-associated pelvic pain, testing the drug Visanne (sh t00660aa, bay86-5258), with inclusion criteria being female patients with endometriosis-associated pelvic pain and exclusion criteria including pregnancy, lactation, hormone dependent tumor history or suspicion, therapy resistant endometriosis or need for primary surgical treatment, and any other conditions which forbid participation.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of high and low dose clonidine hcl sustained release and placebo in treating attention deficit disorder with hyperactivity in children between 6 and 17 years old, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of corifollitropin alfa and ganirelix in females undergoing controlled ovarian stimulation for in vitro fertilization, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the effectiveness of ciclesonide and placebo drugs, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed, and the diseases are represented by ICD-10 codes.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of bortezomib, lenalidomide, and dexamethasone in treating symptomatic multiple myeloma patients who have received a minimum of 1 cycle, maximum of 6 cycles, of a dexamethasone-based regimen and have met specific eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ranibizumab in treating visual impairment caused by macular edema secondary to retinal vein occlusion, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for melanoma testing ipilimumab, placebo, and dacarbazine, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for subjects with type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of insulin degludec/liraglutide and insulin degludec, with inclusion criteria including stable daily doses of basal insulin and metformin, and exclusion criteria including treatment with GLP-1 receptor agonists, impaired liver or renal function, and history of chronic pancreatitis or idiopathic acute pancreatitis.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for overactive bladder, testing the drug fesoterodine fumarate, with inclusion criteria of micturitions >= 8 per day and urinary urgency episodes >=1 per day, and exclusion criteria including known hypersensitivity to the drug or neurological disease influencing bladder function.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of abatacept and methotrexate in treating rheumatoid arthritis in patients who meet specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, including having active clinical synovitis and a positive test result for anticyclic citrullinated peptides 2.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pegylated interferon alfa-2a, tenofovir df / emtricitabine combination therapy, and pegifn / tdf / ftc combination therapy in treating chronic hepatitis B and HIV infections, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for macular degeneration, testing the efficacy of bevasiranib and ranibizumab, with inclusion criteria including age, visual acuity, and lesion type, and exclusion criteria including prior treatment and intraocular surgery.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for insomnia, using the drug org 50081, with inclusion criteria of completing previous protocols and exclusion criteria of ECG abnormalities, abnormal lab values, adverse events, and non-compliance.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for depression, testing the efficacy of desvenlafaxine (dvs sr) versus placebo in peri- and postmenopausal women with MDD, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of dexamethasone in preventing nausea and vomiting in breast cancer patients receiving non-cisplatin moderately emetogenic chemotherapy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for multiple myeloma patients receiving high-dose Melphalan followed by autologous peripheral blood progenitor cell (PBSCT), testing the efficacy of palifermin before only, placebo, and palifermin before and after, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for generalized anxiety disorder, testing the efficacy of pregabalin and placebo in patients who have failed previous GAD treatments, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of peginterferon alfa-2a plus ribavirin in treating patients with chronic hepatitis C and B who are treatment-naïve or have had treatment failure to previous interferon monotherapy or treatment failure to previous lamivudine therapy.

This is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the efficacy of mometasone furoate/formoterol fumarate combination mdi 200/10 mcg bid, mometasone furoate mdi (mf mdi) 200 mcg, formoterol fumarate 10 mcg, and placebo, with eligibility criteria including a medium daily dose of inhaled glucocorticosteroid for at least 12 weeks and a diagnosis of asthma of at least 12 months' duration.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of liraglutide and insulin compared to placebo, with inclusion criteria including stable insulin therapy and HbA1c between 7.5 and 11.0%, and exclusion criteria including treatment with GLP-1 receptor agonist within 12 weeks prior to screening and known proliferative retinopathy or maculopathy requiring treatment.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pramipexole and placebo in treating advanced idiopathic Parkinson's disease, with strict inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with schizophrenia, schizoaffective disorder, or bipolar I disorder and metabolic syndrome, testing the efficacy of switching from olanzapine, risperidone, or quetiapine to aripiprazole, with inclusion and exclusion criteria including specific medical conditions and medication use.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for chronic hepatitis C, testing the efficacy of albumin interferon alfa-2b, peginterferon alfa-2a, and ribavirin in patients with specific eligibility criteria, including genotype 2/3 infection and no prior interferon treatment.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of taranabant and placebo in treating obesity, with inclusion criteria based on BMI and obesity-related comorbidities, and exclusion criteria including diabetes mellitis and significant cardiovascular disease.

This is a phase 3 trial for bipolar depression, testing the efficacy of lurasidone and placebo in patients with bipolar I disorder who are currently being treated with lithium or divalproex or willing to begin treatment with them. The eligibility criteria include meeting DSM-IV-TR criteria for bipolar I disorder, having a lifetime history of at least one bipolar manic or mixed manic episode, and being in good physical health. The exclusion criteria include being considered at imminent risk of suicide or injury to self, others, or property, having any chronic organic disease of the CNS (other than Bipolar I Disorder), and having a clinically significant history of alcohol or substance abuse within the past 3 months or alcohol or substance dependence within the past 12 months.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pregabalin versus placebo in treating peripheral neuropathic pain syndrome, including diabetic neuropathies and neuralgia, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on diagnosis and pain scores.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for prostate cancer patients who have failed local treatments and have no metastases, testing the efficacy of a combination of drugs including bicalutamide, docetaxel, and paclitaxel, with eligibility criteria including specific disease characteristics and patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy restrictions.
