This phase 3 trial is testing a new formulation of Rebif and interferon beta-1b for relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis (RRMS) and has strict inclusion and exclusion criteria, including no prior interferon beta therapy and no use of certain medications within a certain time frame.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for osteoarthritis, testing the efficacy of naproxcinod and naproxen compared to placebo, with inclusion criteria of chronic NSAID or acetaminophen use and exclusion criteria of uncontrolled hypertension or diabetes, hepatic or renal impairment, and recent participation in another investigational study.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for pain, testing the efficacy of pregabalin and placebo in patients with osteoarthritis, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for skin and soft tissue infections caused by Gram-positive bacteria, testing the efficacy of daptomycin, vancomycin, and teicoplanin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for subjects.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, testing the efficacy of pirfenidone and placebo drugs, with eligibility criteria including age, lung function, and ability to walk, and exclusion criteria including other medical conditions and withdrawal from other IPF trials.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with primary hypercholesterolemia or mixed dyslipidemia, testing the efficacy of niacin (+) laropiprant and comparing it to simvastatin and atorvastatin calcium, with specified inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with bipolar I disorder, testing the drug cariprazine, with inclusion criteria including confirmation of diagnosis and experiencing a manic or mixed episode within the past 12 months, and exclusion criteria including a diagnosis of an axis I disorder other than bipolar I disorder.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for generalized anxiety disorder using quetiapine fumarate as the drug, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed, and the disease is identified by its ICD-10 code F41.1.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of apixaban and acetylsalicylic acid in reducing the risk of stroke in patients with atrial fibrillation and at least one risk factor for stroke, while excluding patients with certain medical conditions or taking certain medications.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of rosuvastatin, a lipid-lowering therapy, on primary hypercholesterolemia with CV risk > 20%/10yrs, type 2 diabetes, or a history of CHD or other established atherosclerotic disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of docetaxel in treating unresectable non-small cell lung cancer in patients who meet specific eligibility criteria, including age and performance status, and have no prior anaphylactic reaction to any taxane.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of melatonin versus placebo in improving anorexia and cachexia in patients with gastrointestinal or lung cancer who have experienced involuntary weight loss, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder and comorbid depression, testing the efficacy of quetiapine extended release and risperidone, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of paliperidone palmitate, a drug used to treat schizophrenia, on patients who meet specific inclusion criteria, such as having a PANSS total score of 60 to 120 and a documented history of exposure to either a risperidone formulation or a paliperidone formulation.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of atomoxetine and other standard therapy for ADHD in children aged 6 to 16 years old who are pharmacological naïve and have a diagnosis of ADHD according to DSM IV, confirmed by SADS PL, with normal intelligence, and without a history of bipolar disorder, psychosis, autism spectrum disorder, seizure disorder, significant prior or current medical conditions, alcohol or drug abuse within the past 3 months, or taking any of the excluded medications in the study.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for multiple myeloma patients over 65 years old, testing the efficacy of melphalan/prednisone/velcade and thalidomide/prednisone/velcade, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for insulin-naïve type 2 diabetes patients with HbA1c between 7.0-10.0%, testing the efficacy of insulin degludec and insulin glargine in combination with metformin, DPP-4 inhibitor, or alpha-glucosidase-inhibitor, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of retigabine ir, a drug used to treat epilepsy, in patients who have experienced at least 4 partial-onset seizures during an 8-week baseline phase and are receiving a stable dose of one of the following AEDs: carbamazepine/oxcarbazepine, lamotrigine, levetiracetam or valproic acid.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of inhaled insulin for treating type 2 diabetes with a list of icd-10 codes and eligibility criteria, including stable doses of drugs for the preceding two months and exclusion of type 1 diabetes and smoking.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of paliperidone and placebo in treating schizophrenia, with inclusion criteria including a DSM-IV diagnosis of schizophrenia and a PANSS score between 70 and 120, and exclusion criteria including a history of neuroleptic malignant syndrome and treatment with clozapine for treatment refractory or treatment resistant schizophrenia.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension, testing the efficacy of aliskiren, valsartan, and hydrochlorothiazide, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for pancreatic cancer, testing the efficacy of fluorouracil, gemcitabine hydrochloride, and liposomal cisplatin, with eligibility criteria including confirmed adenocarcinoma of the pancreas and meeting certain patient characteristics.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for kidney transplantation using tacrolimus as the drug, with eligibility criteria including patients between 18 and 60 years of age with end stage kidney disease and exclusion criteria such as high immunological risk and ongoing dosing with corticosteroids.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of TMC278 and efavirenz in treating HIV-1 infections in patients who have never been treated with a therapeutic HIV vaccine or an ARV drug prior to screening, and have a plasma viral load > 5,000 HIV-1 RNA copies/mL, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of venous thrombosis using fondaparinux 2.5mg or placebo, with eligibility criteria including a diagnosis of acute symptomatic superficial thrombophlebitis of the lower limbs at least 5 cm long by compression ultrasound and exclusion criteria including deep vein thrombosis or pulmonary embolism within last 6 months, treatment for cancer during last 6 months, and anticoagulant medication for more than 48 hours prior to inclusion.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for surgically incurable melanoma with a list of drugs including dacarbazine, cp-675,206, and temozolomide, and eligibility criteria including serum LDH level and ECOG performance status.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of imatinib mesylate in treating gastrointestinal stromal tumor patients who have undergone complete gross resection of a primary GIST within 70 days prior to registration and meet other eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of various inhalation powders and salbutamol in treating chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in subjects with a history of smoking, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for previously untreated Waldenström macroglobulinemia, splenic lymphoma with villous lymphocytes, or non-IgM lymphoplasmacytic lymphoma, using chlorambucil and fludarabine phosphate as drugs, with eligibility criteria including performance status, life expectancy, and negative pregnancy test.
This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of folate, vitamin B6, and vitamin B12 in treating Alzheimer's disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of vildagliptin, gliclazide, and metformin, with inclusion criteria including stable metformin dose, blood glucose criteria, and BMI range, and exclusion criteria including pregnancy or lactation, type 1 diabetes, significant diabetic or cardiovascular complications, and other protocol-defined criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of synvisc, bupivicaine, and kenalog injections in treating osteoarthritis in the carpometacarpal joint, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This is a phase 3 trial for patients with non-small cell lung cancer who have previously received one platinum-containing chemotherapy regimen and no more than two prior systemic anti-cancer therapies. The drug being tested is pemetrexed, and the eligibility criteria include a diagnosis of locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC that is not amenable to curative therapy.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of prucalopride and placebo in male subjects with chronic constipation, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for lupus nephritis, testing the efficacy of mycophenolate mofetil, cyclophosphamide, and prednisone, with inclusion criteria of adult patients with SLE and lupus nephritis (class III, IV or V) and exclusion criteria of recent cytotoxic drug use, systemic infections, and hepatitis B or C or HIV.

This phase 3 trial will test the efficacy of telmisartan (micardis®) vs. placebo in treating metabolic syndrome x, with eligibility criteria including abdominal obesity, increased waist circumference, and additional criteria of the metabolic syndrome such as triglycerides >=1.7mmol/L and fasting glucose >=6.1 mmol/L.

This is a phase 3 trial for osteoporosis, testing the efficacy of alendronate and placebo in postmenopausal women or men over 60 years with a history of low trauma vertebral fractures or low bone mineral density, and who have been pretreated with bisphosphonates for at least four years, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for a drug called vi-0521, which is being tested for its effectiveness in treating obesity and type 2 diabetes in patients who meet specific eligibility criteria, including having a BMI of at least 27, certain blood pressure and triglyceride levels, and a waist circumference above a certain threshold.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with unresectable or metastatic melanoma, testing the efficacy of sorafenib, carboplatin/paclitaxel, and placebo, with eligibility criteria including confirmed diagnosis, measurable disease, and previous treatment with DTIC or TMZ.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of phenoxodiol and carboplatin compared to placebo in treating recurrent or persistent advanced ovarian, fallopian tube, or primary peritoneal carcinoma of epithelial origin, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of NKTR-118 and usual care in treating opioid-induced constipation (OIC) in patients with confirmed OIC and <3 SBMs/week, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified, and patients randomized to receive NKTR-118 must stop all laxatives and other bowel regimens except bisacodyl as rescue medication.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of dapagliflozin and metformin compared to placebo, with eligibility criteria including C-peptide levels and BMI, and exclusion criteria including unstable cardiovascular, renal, hepatic, hematologic, oncologic, endocrine, psychiatric, or rheumatic diseases.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of schizophrenia with paliperidone er, where participants must meet specific inclusion criteria and not have certain exclusion criteria. The trial is focused on participants who have been previously non-acute and have been given an adequate dose of an appropriate oral antipsychotic for an adequate period of time prior to enrollment, but previous treatment is considered unsuccessful due to one or more of the following reasons: lack of effectiveness, lack of tolerability or safety, lack of compliance and/or other reasons to switch to another antipsychotic medication.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the efficacy of vilanterol and salmeterol inhalation powders compared to placebos, with inclusion criteria such as clinical diagnosis of asthma and use of inhaled corticosteroids, and exclusion criteria such as history of life-threatening asthma and allergies to study drugs.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with genotype 1 hepatitis C infection, testing the efficacy of placebo, tmc435, peginterferon alpha-2a, and ribavirin, with inclusion criteria including a recent liver biopsy and the use of effective contraception throughout the study.

This is a phase 3 trial for patients with primary squamous cell carcinoma of the thoracic esophagus, testing the efficacy of neoadjuvant chemotherapy (cisplatin, 5-fluorouracil) with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with atherosclerosis and kidney failure, testing the effectiveness of tacrolimus, mycophenolate mofetil, prednisone, and sirolimus, with eligibility criteria including a history of dialysis or diabetes, and exclusion criteria including malignancy and non-renal organ transplant.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for Chinese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of glimepiride and metformin hydrochloride combination and glimepiride, with eligibility criteria including inadequate control with metformin and exclusion criteria including HbA1c < 7% or > 10%, and fasting plasma glucose > 250 mg/dL, among others.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of bg00012 and placebo in treating relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis, with eligibility criteria including a confirmed diagnosis of RRMS and a baseline EDSS between 0.0 and 5.0, while exclusion criteria include other chronic diseases of the immune system, malignancies, and pregnancy or nursing.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for obesity, testing the efficacy of sibutramine hydrochloride and placebo, with eligibility criteria including BMI and medical history, and exclusion criteria including recent myocardial infarction and hyperthyroidism.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for mild to moderate asthma patients using budesonide/formoterol, with inclusion criteria including confirmed diagnosis and current use of inhaled corticoid-steroid medicine, and exclusion criteria including pregnancy, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, and use of beta blocker therapy or steroid tablets/injections.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with moderate to severe chronic kidney disease, testing the efficacy of ast-120 and placebo drugs, with eligibility criteria including age, serum creatinine levels, and urinary protein to creatinine ratio.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of Rebif® new formulation and placebo in treating relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis, with inclusion criteria such as having a score of <=5.5 on the Expanded Disability Status Scale and exclusion criteria such as having received monoclonal antibodies or immunosuppressive therapy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for epilepsy patients with simple or complex partial seizures, testing the efficacy of lacosamide with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and the trial includes a list of diseases, icd-10 codes, and drugs.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for cariprazine in patients with schizophrenia, with inclusion criteria including meeting DSM-IV-TR criteria for schizophrenia and normal physical examination, and exclusion criteria including other psychotic disorders; the trial will test the efficacy of cariprazine in treating schizophrenia.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for osteoporosis, testing the efficacy of tibolone and placebo in postmenopausal women with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, including a BMI of 34 kg/m^2 and screening BMD of the total hip and/or spine equal to or lower than 2.5 SD T-score for subjects without an asymptomatic fracture or equal to or lower than -2.0 SD T-score for subjects with an asymptomatic fracture.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of ciclesonide (xrp1526) on patients with persistent bronchial asthma who meet specific inclusion criteria and do not meet any of the exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of ospemifene 60 mg and placebo in treating vaginal atrophy and vaginal diseases in naturally or surgically menopausal women with intact uterus and specific vaginal pH and maturation index criteria, with exclusion criteria including endometrial hyperplasia, cancer, abnormal Pap smear, uterine bleeding, current vaginal infection, and use of hormonal medications.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of docetaxel and doxil in treating locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer in females who have received prior anthracycline therapy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for low back pain, testing the efficacy of placebo and buprenorphine transdermal system as drugs, with inclusion criteria of clinical diagnosis of low back pain for 4 weeks or longer and exclusion criteria of current chronic diseases requiring frequent analgesic therapy.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of insulin glulisine in combination with stable oral antidiabetic therapy for type 2 diabetes mellitus patients with HbA1c ≥ 8.0%, while excluding subjects with insulin use within the previous year, impaired renal function, and other exclusion criteria.

This is a phase 3 trial for breast cancer patients who have undergone breast conserving surgery or modified radical mastectomy plus axillary lymph node dissection, and the study will test the efficacy of carboplatin, carmustine, cisplatin, cyclophosphamide, doxorubicin hydrochloride, paclitaxel, tamoxifen citrate, and thiotepa as treatment options. The eligibility criteria include various medical and demographic factors, and patients must not have received prior chemotherapy or hormonal therapy for breast cancer.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the drug paliperidone er in patients with schizophrenia, with inclusion criteria based on DSM-IV diagnosis and PANSS score, and exclusion criteria including substance dependence and previous lack of response to risperidone.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of dexmethylphenidate, mixed amphetamine salts, er, and placebo in treating attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, with inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) testing the efficacy of multiple drugs including gsk573719/gw642444 and tiotropium bromide, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of cobi, rtv, atv, ftc/tdf, and their placebos in treating HIV and HIV infections, with specific eligibility criteria including plasma HIV-1 RNA levels, genotype report, renal and hematologic function, and highly effective contraception methods.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ustekinumab in treating psoriatic arthritis, with inclusion criteria including a diagnosis of active PsA and at least 5 tender and 5 swollen joints, and exclusion criteria including a history of using therapeutic agents targeted at reducing IL-12 or IL-23, and a medical history of latent or active granulomatous infection.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of mometasone furoate/formoterol combination and formoterol mdi compared to placebo in treating moderate to severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in patients who meet specific eligibility criteria, including having COPD symptoms for at least 24 months and being an ex- or current smoker with a smoking history of at least 10 pack years.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for metastatic breast cancer patients with measurable and/or evaluable disease, using paclitaxel as the drug, and with inclusion criteria such as ECOG performance status 0-2 and normal cardiac function, and exclusion criteria such as peripheral neuropathy > grade 2 and adjuvant taxane-based therapy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for childhood cancer, aplastic anemia, and metabolic disorders, using heparin and normal saline as drugs, and requiring a single lumen Broviac or double lumen Hickman-type CVC for chemotherapy, blood product support or hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, with exclusion criteria including thrombophilia and bleeding disorder.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of the drugs cg5503 and placebo in treating painful diabetic peripheral neuropathy in patients with controlled blood glucose levels and who have been taking analgesic medications for at least 3 months prior to screening.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of peginterferon alfa-2b (pegetron) plus ribavirin (rebetol) in treating chronic hepatitis C patients with genotype 3, who are treatment naïve before current course of therapy and meet specific eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of paliperidone er, an antipsychotic drug, in treating schizophrenia in patients aged 65 or older with a PANSS score between 70 and 120, who have completed 6 weeks of double-blind treatment or at least 21 days of treatment and discontinued due to lack of efficacy, and who meet other inclusion criteria while excluding those with certain DSM-IV diagnoses or histories of tardive dyskinesia or lack of response to antipsychotics.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension, testing the efficacy of nebivolol and metoprolol er (tm) in patients with Stage I/II hypertension, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of vascular and mixed dementia using donepezil, with inclusion criteria requiring a reliable caregiver and exclusion criteria excluding subjects with primary psychiatric diagnoses other than dementia of the Alzheimer's type or vascular dementia.

This is a phase 3 trial for essential hypertension testing the drugs xoma 985, amlodipine besylate, and perindopril erbumine, with eligibility criteria including hypertension and exclusion criteria such as renal dysfunction and heart failure.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder, testing the efficacy of DVS SR and paroxetine, with eligibility criteria including a HAM D17 total score ≥20 and exclusion criteria including prior treatment with DVS SR and significant suicide risk.

This is a phase 3 trial for the management of moderate to severe malignant or nonmalignant pain using oxycodone hydrochloride controlled-release tablets in patients aged 6 to 17 years who completed the 4-week study drug treatment in study OTR3001 and who will benefit from continuing treatment. The trial has inclusion and exclusion criteria, and the icd-10 codes for the disease are provided.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for ulcerative colitis, testing the efficacy of colal-pred® and prednisolone, with inclusion criteria of endoscopically confirmed diagnosis and a score of 6-10 on the Disease Activity Index (DAI), and exclusion criteria of previous colonic surgery, other unstable treatments, and certain medical conditions.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for multiple sclerosis testing the efficacy of teriflunomide and placebo, with inclusion criteria including a well-defined neurological event consistent with demyelination and screening MRI scan with 2 or more T2 lesions at least 3mm in diameter.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for multiple sclerosis testing the efficacy of laquinimod, placebo, and interferon β-1a (avonex®) in patients with relapsing-remitting MS, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) patients, testing the efficacy of MCI-186 and placebo of MCI-186, with inclusion criteria based on diagnostic criteria and disease progression, and exclusion criteria including severe complications, pregnancy, and recent participation in other trials.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for small cell lung cancer with extensive disease, testing the efficacy of topotecan + cisplatin and etoposide + carboplatin, with specific eligibility criteria including no prior chemotherapy and adequate organ function.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for rheumatoid arthritis testing the efficacy of rituximab, methotrexate, and methylprednisolone, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patients.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the efficacy of montelukast sodium and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed, and icd-10 codes provided for the disease.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) with drugs including ldx 30 mg, ldx 50 mg, ldx 70 mg, and placebo, and eligibility criteria including meeting DSM-IV-TR criteria for ADHD, having a baseline ADHD-RS-IV score >=28, and having blood pressure within the 95th percentile for age, gender, and height.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for newly diagnosed multiple myeloma patients, testing the efficacy of lenalidomide and bortezomib/lenalidomide/low dose dex, with eligibility criteria including age, performance status, adequate marrow function, negative pregnancy test, and no prior malignancy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for non-small cell lung cancer with adenocarcinoma histology, testing the efficacy of gefitinib, carboplatin, and paclitaxel, with specific eligibility criteria for never smokers or light ex-smokers.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of capecitabine, interferon, and interleukin in treating metastatic renal cell carcinoma, with specific eligibility criteria including confirmed diagnosis, adequate organ function, and written informed consent.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ckd-501 0.5mg and pioglitazone 15mg in treating type 2 diabetes mellitus patients who meet specific eligibility criteria, including age, BMI, and C-peptide level, while excluding patients with certain medical histories or conditions.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of pi-88 versus placebo in patients with primary liver cancer who have undergone curative resection, with key inclusion criteria including histologically-proven hepatocellular carcinoma and Child Pugh classification A or B.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of zoledronic acid in breast cancer patients who have undergone prior preoperative chemotherapy containing a taxane and an anthracycline, with inclusion criteria including complete resection of primary carcinoma of the breast and histologically detectable tumor residuals, while exclusion criteria include prior treatment with bisphosphonates since breast cancer surgery and concurrent treatment with other experimental drugs or any other anti-cancer therapy.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of capecitabine, fluorouracil, leucovorin calcium, and oxaliplatin in treating advanced and/or metastatic colorectal adenocarcinoma, with eligibility criteria including measurable disease, WHO performance status 0-2, and various medical exclusions.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for ovarian and peritoneal cancer patients with suboptimal residual disease, testing the efficacy of cisplatin and paclitaxel, with eligibility criteria including specific histologies and patient characteristics, and excluding prior chemotherapy and certain medical conditions.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ferric carboxymaltose in treating iron-deficiency anemia in patients with indolent non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, multiple myeloma, or chronic lymphocytic leukemia who have received at least 12 weeks of chemotherapy and meet specific eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of paliperidone palmitate and risperidone in treating schizophrenia, with inclusion criteria including a PANSS score between 60 and 120 and a diagnosis of schizophrenia according to DSM-IV.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of aliskiren/hydrochlorothiazide and aliskiren in treating Stage II hypertension, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified, and the presence of hypertension-related diseases and icd-10 codes.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for cervical cancer patients with measurable disease, testing the efficacy of cisplatin, gemcitabine hydrochloride, and paclitaxel, with eligibility criteria including age, performance status, renal function, and prior therapy history.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for bone marrow disease and pain, using drugs fentanyl, emla, l.m.x4, and propofol, with eligibility criteria including age 2-17 and specific diagnoses of acute lymphoblastic leukemia or lymphoblastic lymphoma in remission.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for gastroesophageal reflux disease, testing the efficacy of dexlansoprazole MR and excluding subjects with certain medical conditions or medication use.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for postmenopausal osteoporosis using arzoxifene and raloxifene, with inclusion criteria including osteoporosis, age between 50 and 75, and ability to walk, and exclusion criteria including bone diseases other than osteoporosis, estrogen dependent cancer, and certain heart problems.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of ly2216684, a noradrenergic agent, in treating major depressive disorder in patients who have had a partial response to an SSRI, with inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined in the eligibility criteria section.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug e2007 on patients with Parkinson's disease who have predictable motor fluctuations of the wearing OFF type, and are taking optimised levodopa therapy, to evaluate its efficacy and safety.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of gastroesophageal reflux using esomeprazole, with inclusion criteria of chronic reflux esophagitis or symptomatic GERD and exclusion criteria of certain surgeries, contraindication to the study drug, and pregnancy/lactation/child-bearing potential.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for prostate cancer, testing the efficacy of bicalutamide, goserelin acetate, docetaxel, estramustine phosphate sodium, and acetylsalicylic acid, with eligibility criteria including confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate, no suspected metastases, and meeting certain poor prognosis criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with atrial fibrillation, testing the efficacy of dronedarone and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria based on disease history and risk factors.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes and hyperlipidemia, testing the efficacy of colesevelam hcl, rosiglitazone maleate, and sitagliptin phosphate, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of rebetol and copegus in treating previously untreated adults with chronic hepatitis C, genotype 1, who have compensated liver disease and meet specific eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) testing the efficacy of aclidinium bromide, tiotropium, and placebo drugs, with inclusion criteria of males and females aged ≥ 40 years and current or ex-smokers of ≥ 10 pack-year, and exclusion criteria of history or current diagnosis of asthma, allergic rhinitis, or atopy, respiratory tract infection or acute COPD exacerbation in the last 6 weeks, hospitalization for an acute COPD exacerbation in the last 3 months, and evidence of contraindicated use of anticholinergic drugs.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for impaired glucose tolerance and diabetes, using avandamet (rosiglitazone 2mg/metformin 500mg) bid, with inclusion criteria of Ontario residents aged 18-75 with IGT on OGTT and exclusion criteria including current use of metformin or rosiglitazone, prior use of medication to treat diabetes except gestational diabetes, and liver function studies greater than 2.5x normal.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Alzheimer's type dementia using galantamine hydrobromide as the drug, with inclusion criteria including severe dementia and progressive worsening of memory, and exclusion criteria including dementia caused by cerebrovascular disease and major sensorimotor impairment.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of status epilepticus and convulsions using lorazepam, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on the patient's previous treatment and adverse reactions.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis, testing the efficacy of interferon beta-1b (betaseron, bay86-5046), with inclusion criteria including completion of a previous study, medical assessment, and negative pregnancy test, and exclusion criteria including severe heart disease, severe depression, and epilepsy not adequately controlled by treatment.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of anagliptin and placebo, with inclusion criteria including uncontrolled blood glucose and exclusion criteria including type 1 diabetes and insulin therapy.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for non-constipation irritable bowel syndrome, testing the efficacy of rifaximin and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of dapagliflozin and metformin, with eligibility criteria including inadequate glycemic control, drug-naivety, and specific health parameters, while excluding certain medical conditions and recent medication use.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes and renal insufficiency, testing the efficacy of bi 10773 and placebo drugs, with eligibility criteria including HbA1c levels and exclusion criteria including liver disease and recent bariatric surgery.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of eslicarbazepine acetate and placebo in treating painful diabetic neuropathy, with inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

This phase 3 trial focuses on patients with breast neoplasms and tests the efficacy of various drug combinations, including doxorubicine + docetaxel sequential, in combination with eligibility criteria such as normal cardiac function and negative pregnancy test.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for head and neck cancer patients, testing the effectiveness of carboplatin, cisplatin, docetaxel, and fluorouracil, with eligibility criteria including confirmed squamous cell carcinoma, specific primary tumor sites, and various medical conditions and exclusions.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of nitazoxanide and vancomycin in treating clostridium infections, with eligibility criteria including patients with new onset of disease evidenced by diarrhea and peripheral leukocytosis, and exclusion criteria including patients with other known causes of diarrhea or colitis and history of hypersensitivity to nitazoxanide or vancomycin.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus patients with HbA1c 7.0-10.0% using insulin degludec and insulin glargine, with eligibility criteria including current treatment with specific medications and exclusion criteria including recent use of certain medications and cardiovascular disease.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of keratoconjunctivitis sicca and dry eye disease using lifitegrast and placebo, with eligibility criteria including a patient-reported history of dry eye in both eyes and a positive response to the Controlled Adverse Environment model.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for depressive disorder, major, testing the efficacy of duloxetine and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria including age, previous depression episodes, and medical history.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for gout patients with serum urate level greater than or equal to 8.0 mg/dL, testing the efficacy of febuxostat and allopurinol as urate-lowering drugs, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of lantus, metformin, glyburide, and thiazolidinedione, with inclusion criteria of stable doses of two oral antidiabetic drugs, and exclusion criteria of major cardiovascular events.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of alogliptin and metformin in treating type 2 diabetes mellitus with inadequate glycemic control, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for venous thromboembolism, testing the efficacy of semuloparin sodium and enoxaparin sodium compared to placebo in preventing deep vein thrombosis or pulmonary embolism after elective total hip replacement surgery or revision, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes, testing the efficacy of metformin, sulphonylurea, and saxagliptin, with inclusion criteria of HbA1c >6.5% and ≤10.0%, and exclusion criteria of type 1 diabetes and insulin therapy within one year of enrollment.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of regorafenib and placebo in treating metastatic colorectal cancer patients who have failed at least two prior treatments, with specific eligibility criteria including histological documentation of adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum, measurable or non-measurable disease, and Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of 1.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of syr-472 and alogliptin 25 mg compared to placebo, with inclusion criteria being outpatient status and signed informed consent, and exclusion criteria being serious cardiac, cerebrovascular, pancreatic, or hematological disease.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of calcipotriene foam and vehicle foam in treating moderate plaque-type psoriasis on the body and scalp, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This phase 3 trial is testing treatment for locally advanced non-squamous lung cancer with the drugs "treatment" and eligibility criteria including a positive ALK gene locus and no prior systemic treatment for the disease.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of canagliflozin, metformin, and sulphonylruea against placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for breast cancer patients with specific disease characteristics and patient characteristics, testing the drug tamoxifen citrate as endocrine therapy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for vildagliptin, a drug used to treat type 2 diabetes, with inclusion criteria including a diagnosis of type 2 diabetes for at least 6 months, meeting blood glucose criteria, and having a BMI in the range of 22-40.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of infection using ibuprofen and placebo, with eligibility criteria including fever secondary to uncomplicated acute viral or bacterial infection and otherwise good health.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of vildagliptin and placebo in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, with inclusion criteria including age ≥ 70 years, confirmed diagnosis of T2DM, HbA1c of ≥ 7% and ≤10.0%, and BMI in the range of 19-45kg/m2, and exclusion criteria including FPG ≥ 270 mg/dL, previous or current participation in any vildagliptin clinical study, and history of hypersensitivity to DPP-4 inhibitors.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of cetuximab, capecitabine, and cisplatin in treating unresectable advanced or metastatic gastric cancer with specific eligibility criteria, including confirmed adenocarcinoma and measurable lesions, while excluding patients with certain medical conditions or prior treatments.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of umeclidinium bromide/vilanterol, fluticasone propionate/salmeterol, and placebo in treating chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in patients who are current or former smokers with a history of >=10 pack-years, and have a pre and post-salbutamol FEV1/FVC ratio of <0.70 and a post-salbutamol FEV1 of >=30% and <=70% of predicted normal values calculated using NHANES III reference equations.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for women with a history of stage 0-II breast cancer and menopausal symptoms, testing the drug norethindrone acetate, with eligibility criteria including hormone receptor status and no prior or concurrent chemotherapy or radiotherapy.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) using atomoxetine as the drug, with inclusion criteria of age, ADHD diagnosis, and normal intelligence, and exclusion criteria of weight, other psychiatric diagnoses, suicidal risk, severe allergies, and recent alcohol or drug abuse.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of ezetimibe + simvastatin, simvastatin, and placebo in treating hypercholesterolemia and atherosclerosis, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with non-ST-segment elevation Acute Coronary Syndrome, testing the efficacy of otamixaban, ufh, and eptifibatide, with eligibility criteria including ischemic symptoms, elevated cardiac biomarkers, and planned coronary angiography.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of hydromorphone hcl, oxycodone hcl cr, and placebo in managing moderate to severe cancer pain in participants who require between 40 mg and 184 mg of oral morphine or morphine equivalents every 24 hours, and who are not expected to start a course of chemotherapy, radiotherapy, targeted cancer therapy, hormone therapy or diphosphates therapy after enrolment into the study.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for breakthrough pain and cancer patients, testing the efficacy of fentanyl ethypharm as a treatment, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with depression, HIV infections, and hepatitis C, testing the efficacy of citalopram and placebos, with eligibility criteria including chronic HCV infection and exclusion criteria including prior suicide attempt or active depression.
This phase 3 trial is testing preladenant, rasagiline, and placebo as adjunct therapy for Parkinson's disease patients taking L-dopa, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for infertility, testing the efficacy of corifollitropin alfa, recfsh, gonadatropin releasing hormone antagonist, human chorion gonadatropin, and placebos, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of odanacatib and placebo for odanacatib in treating osteoporosis in males between 40 and 95 years of age, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for glaucoma, testing the effectiveness of timolol and latanoprost, with inclusion criteria including a diagnosis of glaucoma and IOP of 22 mmHg or above, and exclusion criteria including prior cyclodestructive procedures and ocular trauma or surgery within 3 months of the baseline visit.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the drug Lu AA21004 in patients with major depressive disorder who have completed a preceding study, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed, and the drug and disease values provided.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) testing the efficacy of glycopyrronium bromide compared to placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on smoking history, lung function, and comorbid conditions.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for depression, testing the efficacy of escitalopram, placebo, peginterferon alfa-2a, and ribavirin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of apremilast in treating psoriatic arthritis, with inclusion criteria including a diagnosis of PSA, inadequate response to DMARDs, and ≥ 3 swollen and tender joints, and the drugs being tested include apremilast and placebo.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic hepatitis C patients with genotype 1, using daclatasvir, peg-interferon alfa-2a, and ribavirin as drugs, and the eligibility criteria includes HCV RNA viral load of ≥10,000 IU/mL at screening and liver biopsy obtained ≤36 months prior to first treatment for compensated cirrhotics.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of a combination of pi, rtv, ftc/tdf, and stribild in treating acquired immunodeficiency syndrome and HIV infections, with strict inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for myelodysplastic syndromes and anemia, testing the efficacy of epoetin alfa and placebo, with specific eligibility criteria including no prior use of erythropoietin stimulating agents and exclusion of anemia caused by factors other than MDS.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of bemiparin and placebo in preventing thrombosis in cancer patients with a CVC, who meet certain eligibility criteria and do not have any exclusion criteria, and have a platelet count above 30,000/mm3, and have given their informed consent to participate in the study.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with hypertension and stroke, testing the drug cilnidipine, with inclusion criteria of ischemic stroke patients with hypertension and exclusion criteria of cardioembolic stroke patients, severe hypertensive patients, and secondary hypertensive patients.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder using bupropion xl as the drug, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed, and icd-10 codes provided for the disease.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of hcrf and placebo hcrf drugs in treating brain edema and brain tumor patients who have steroid-associated side effects and require dexamethasone, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of moderate to severe atopic dermatitis using tacrolimus ointment, with eligibility criteria including age range, previous medication use, and written informed consent.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of rolofylline and placebo in treating heart failure patients with impaired renal function, with a list of exclusion criteria including acute contrast induced nephropathy, ongoing IV therapy for heart failure with certain agents, and various medical conditions such as severe pulmonary disease and brain tumors.
This is a phase 3 trial for patients with moderate to severe COPD, testing the efficacy of qva149 and tiotropium, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for venous thromboembolism prevention in patients undergoing elective total knee replacement, with drugs including rivaroxaban, enoxaparin, and placebos, and eligibility criteria including age and absence of bleeding risk.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with atrial fibrillation or lung cancer, testing the drug amiodarone, with eligibility criteria including resectable lung nodules or mass and exclusion criteria including allergy to amiodarone and documented atrial fibrillation within the past 12 months.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic low back pain using OROS hydromorphone slow release as the drug, with inclusion criteria requiring patients to have completed short-term Study DO-127 and requiring at least 8 mg of the drug every 24 hours, and exclusion criteria including intolerance or hypersensitivity to hydromorphone, pregnancy or breastfeeding, significant CNS disorder, and risk for serious decreases in blood pressure upon taking an opioid analgesic.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of sitagliptin and metformin against placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of Prograf-xl and Prograf, along with mycophenolate mofetil, in liver transplant recipients, with inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined in the eligibility criteria section.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for relapsing multiple sclerosis, testing the drug fty720, with inclusion criteria of age 18-65 and exclusion criteria including certain immune, heart, and lung conditions, as well as patients on certain medications.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of lapaquistat acetate and current lipid-lowering treatment in patients with homozygous FH and a stable, approved lipid-lowering drug regimen, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of tegafur-gimeracil-oteracil potassium and tegafur-uracil in treating stage III or IV squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, with eligibility criteria including completed definitive treatment within the past 3 months and ECOG performance status 0-1.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug carboxyamidotriazole for patients with stage III or IV non-small cell lung cancer who have had one prior chemotherapy regimen, and have met certain eligibility criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for schizophrenia with the drugs asenapine and olanzapine, and the eligibility criteria includes having completed a previous trial and having an acceptable degree of compliance, while excluding those with unstable medical conditions or noncompliance.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of fluocinolone acetonide for diabetic macular edema, with inclusion criteria including age over 18, diagnosis of diabetes mellitus, and best corrected visual acuity of 19-68 letters.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for malignant mesothelioma using doxorubicin hydrochloride and ranpirnase as drugs, with eligibility criteria including confirmed mesothelioma, measurable or evaluable disease, and specific patient characteristics such as ECOG 0-1 performance status and normal creatinine levels.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for cystic fibrosis patients, testing the efficacy of mp-376 (levofloxacin solution for inhalation) compared to placebo, with inclusion criteria including confirmed diagnosis of cystic fibrosis and positive sputum culture for P. aeruginosa, and exclusion criteria including use of any nebulized or systemic antibiotics within 28 days prior to baseline.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder, testing the effectiveness of ziprasidone as an antipsychotic medication, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria based on prior treatment and risk factors.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for neuropathic pain, testing the effectiveness of pregabalin, with inclusion criteria of Chinese outpatients aged 18 to 75 with a score greater than 40 mm on the visual log scale of SF-MPQ, and exclusion criteria of neurologic disorders unrelated to neuropathic pain and serum creatinine clearance greater than 60 ml/min.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of fluticasone propionate inhalation solution, oral prednisone, and salbutamol in treating asthma in Chinese pediatric and adolescent subjects, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for non-small cell lung cancer patients who have received one prior platinum-based chemotherapy regimen and are current cigarette smokers, testing the drug erlotinib (Tarceva) and requiring patients to meet specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of insulin degludec/liraglutide versus placebo in subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus who are on a stable daily dose of sulphonylurea with or without metformin, and have a BMI below or equal to 40 kg/m^2, while excluding those with certain medical conditions or previous treatments.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for pancreatic cancer patients who have undergone complete resection, with eligibility criteria including age, performance status, and no evidence of metastases, and the trial will test the efficacy of fluorouracil, gemcitabine hydrochloride, and leucovorin calcium as treatment options.

This is a phase 3 clinical trial for chronic constipation, testing the efficacy of prucalopride versus placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified, and the use of ICD-10 codes to identify the disease.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with essential hypertension, testing the effectiveness of nifedipine (adalat, baya1040) in reducing blood pressure, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of dasatinib and imatinib in treating Chronic Phase Philadelphia chromosome positive (CP Ph+) CML patients who have failed to achieve CCyR after 3-18 months of therapy with imatinib 400 mg, and the eligibility criteria includes being able to tolerate chronic administration of imatinib at the highest dose, having ECOG PS 0-2, and having adequate hepatic and renal function.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the effectiveness of aspirin and warfarin in reducing the risk of stroke and heart disease in patients with low cardiac EF and a Modified Rankin score <=4, who are taking ACE inhibitors or angiotensin II receptor blockers, and meet other eligibility criteria. The trial includes patients with a recent stroke or TIA within twelve months and chronic CHF patients (NYHA I-IV) who are stable and ambulatory at the time of discharge. The trial excludes patients with certain cardiac sources of embolism, cyanotic congenital heart disease, decompensated heart failure, recent cardiac surgery, angioplasty, or MI, contraindications to the use of warfarin or aspirin, and other comorbid conditions.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the use of aspirin in patients with thrombocytopenia and myocardial infarction, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, while the schema includes columns for phase, diseases, icd codes, drugs, and eligibility criteria.

This is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) testing the efficacy of aclidinium bromide/formoterol fumarate and aclidinium bromide monotherapy compared to placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria including smoking history, FEV1/FVC ratio, and cardiovascular and respiratory conditions.

This is a phase 3 trial for metastatic colorectal cancer testing the efficacy of regorafenib and placebo, with eligibility criteria including documented adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum, progression during or within 3 months following the last administration of approved standard therapies, and an ECOG Performance Status of </= 1.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for type 2 diabetes testing the efficacy of technosphere insulin and powder in patients who meet specific eligibility criteria, including HbA1c levels, BMI, and current diabetes treatment, while excluding patients with certain medical conditions and previous insulin use.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of rosiglitazone, sulfonylurea, and metformin, with inclusion and exclusion criteria related to glucose-lowering therapy, blood pressure, and insulin use.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of paliperidone er and placebo in treating schizophrenia, with inclusion criteria including meeting DSM-IV criteria for schizophrenia, having had at least 1 adequate treatment with an antipsychotic before, and having a PANSS score between 60 and 120, while exclusion criteria include having a known or suspected history of seizure disorder, or neuroleptic malignant syndrome, encephalopathic syndrome, tardive dyskinesia, or insulin dependent diabetes mellitus.

This is a phase 3 trial for patients with psoriatic arthritis, testing the efficacy of onercept and placebo drugs, with eligibility criteria including having plaque psoriasis for at least 12 months, covering at least 10% of total body surface area, and a PASI score of 12.0 or more.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of fluticasone furoate and fluticasone propionate/salmeterol in treating chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in patients with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, including a history of COPD, a post-albuterol spirometry criteria, and no history of severe milk protein allergy, alcohol or drug abuse, or pregnancy/lactation.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for locally advanced or metastatic pancreatic cancer patients who failed one prior gemcitabine-containing chemotherapy regimen, and the study will test the efficacy of fluorouracil and irofulven as treatment options.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for breast cancer patients with specific disease and patient characteristics, testing a combination of drugs including aromatase inhibition therapy, cyclophosphamide, docetaxel, doxorubicin hydrochloride, epirubicin hydrochloride, fluorouracil, paclitaxel, releasing hormone agonist therapy, and tamoxifen citrate, with eligibility criteria including node positivity or negativity and certain tumor characteristics.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for HIV infection using half-boosted and full-boosted fosamprenavir, with inclusion criteria of HIV-1 infection and written consent, and exclusion criteria of pregnancy, breastfeeding, active AIDS condition, pancreatitis, poor kidney function, clinically relevant hepatitis, medication interactions, allergy to study drugs, and other criteria to be evaluated by the physician.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of armodafinil and placebo in treating major depressive episodes in patients with bipolar I disorder who are taking specific mood stabilizers, and have had no more than 6 mood episodes in the last year, with a list of inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of candesartan cilexetil (atacand) in treating hypertension in children between 10-40 kg with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for perennial allergic rhinitis, testing the efficacy of various ciclesonide nasal sprays and placebos, with eligibility criteria including a history of PAR and sensitivity to allergens, and exclusion criteria including respiratory disorders and hypersensitivity to corticosteroids.
This is a phase 3 clinical trial for gout patients with serum urate level >= 8.0 mg/dL, testing the efficacy of febuxostat and allopurinol, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 clinical trial is testing the efficacy of technosphere® insulin inhalation powder and 70% insulin aspart protamine suspension and 30% insulin aspart injection (rdna origin) in treating type 2 diabetes mellitus with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of lixisenatide, sulfonylurea, and metformin in controlling blood glucose levels, with a list of exclusion criteria including various medical conditions and medication use.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the efficacy of flutiform and symbicort turbohaler drugs, with eligibility criteria including age, asthma severity, and reversibility of FEV1, and exclusion criteria including recent hospitalization for asthma and use of certain medications.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension, testing the efficacy of amlodipine in patients with high blood pressure, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Parkinson's disease using the drug parcopa, with inclusion criteria of stable Parkinson's disease and exclusion criteria of idiopathic PD with Hoehn and Yahr state II or III.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for postmenopausal women with vulvar and vaginal atrophy, testing the drug ospemifene 60mg oral tablet, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of insulin human/insuman comb 25 and insulin human/novolin® 30r, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of ezetimibe and simvastatin combination therapy in patients with hypercholesterolemia, type 2 diabetes mellitus, and coronary disease, who are currently taking simvastatin 20 mg daily, and have LDL-C concentration between 2.6 mmol/L and 4.1 mmol/L, and triglyceride concentrations of <3.99 mmol/L, while adhering to specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for osteoarthritis knee pain, testing the efficacy of duloxetine and placebo, with inclusion and exclusion criteria listed.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with ovarian and peritoneal neoplasms, testing the efficacy of a combination of drugs including paclitaxel, carboplatin, and bibf 1120, with eligibility criteria including histologically confirmed cancer, ECOG performance status 0-2, and exclusion criteria including prior systemic therapy for ovarian cancer and contraindications for therapy with paclitaxel or carboplatin.
This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of amlodipine/losartan and amlodipine in treating hypertension, with specific eligibility and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of prograf and lcp-tacro in preventing renal allograft rejection in patients with renal failure, with eligibility criteria including negative cross match test and compatible blood type, while exclusion criteria include history of malignancies and treatment with certain drugs within 3 months prior to enrollment.

The sample is a phase 3 trial testing the efficacy of vortioxetine and escitalopram compared to placebo in treating treatment-emergent sexual dysfunction in patients with major depressive disorder who are currently being treated with selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) monotherapy, and the eligibility criteria includes age, stability, and CGI-S score.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of capecitabine, perifosine, and placebo in treating advanced colorectal cancer patients who have failed previous therapies, and have not been previously exposed to capecitabine in the metastatic colorectal cancer setting, with inclusion and exclusion criteria specified.
